S04bsu021_u:454: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - katamadbhagavan aṣṭottarapadaśatam?
S04bsu021_u:562: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - katividho bhagavan vijñānānāmutpādasthitinirodho bhavati?
S04bsu021_u:564: na ca tārkikā avabudhyante yaduta prabandhanirodho lakṣaṇanirodhaśca /
S04bsu021_u:567: trividhaṃ vijñānaṃ pravṛttilakṣaṇaṃ karmalakṣaṇaṃ jātilakṣaṇaṃ ca /
S04bsu021_u:568: dvividhaṃ mahāmate vijñānaṃ saṃkṣepeṇa aṣṭalakṣaṇoktaṃ khyātivijñānaṃ vastuprativikalpavijñānaṃ ca /
S04bsu021_u:569: yathā mahāmate darpaṇasya rūpagrahaṇam, evaṃ khyātivijñānasyākhyāsyati /
S04bsu021_u:574: tatra sarvendriyavijñānanirodho mahāmate yaduta ālayavijñānasya abhūtaparikalpavāsanāvaicitryanirodhaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:579: tadyathā mahāmate mṛtparamāṇubhyo mṛtpiṇḍaḥ, na cānyo nānanyaḥ, tathā suvarṇaṃ bhūṣaṇāt /
S04bsu021_u:580: yadi ca mahāmate mṛtpiṇḍo mṛtparamāṇubhyo 'nyaḥ syāt, tairnārabdhaḥ syāt /
S04bsu021_u:582: athānanyaḥ syāt, mṛtpiṇḍaparamāṇvoḥ pratibhāgo na syāt /
S04bsu021_u:586: tasmānmahāmate na svajātilakṣaṇanirodho vijñānānāṃ kiṃ tu karmalakṣaṇanirodhaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:589: tīrthakarāṇāṃ mahāmate ayaṃ vādo yaduta viṣayagrahaṇoparamādvijñānaprabandhoparamo bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:592: na cakṣurvijñānasya rūpālokasamudayata utpattiṃ varṇayanti anyatra kāraṇataḥ /

S04bsu021_u:595_0: punaraparaṃ mahāmate saptavidhaḥ paramārtho yaduta cittagocaro jñānagocaraḥ prajñāgocaro
S04bsu021_u:597_1: yena samanvāgatāstathāgatā laukikalokottaratamān dharmānāryeṇa prajñācakṣuṣā svasāmānyalakṣaṇapatitān vyavasthāpayanti /
S04bsu021_u:598: tathā ca vyavasthāpayanti yathā tīrthakaravādakudṛṣṭisādhāraṇā na bhavanti /
S04bsu021_u:603: ye kecinmahāmate śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā abhūtvā śraddhāhetuphalābhivyaktidravyaṃ ca kālāvasthitaṃ pratyayeṣu ca skandhadhātvāyatanānāmutpādasthitiṃ cecchanti,
S04bsu021_u:607: tadyathā mahāmate ghaṭakapālābhāvo ghaṭakṛtyaṃ na karoti,
S04bsu021_u:609: evameva mahāmate ye skandhadhātvāyatanabhāvā niruddhā nirudhyante nirotsyante,
S04bsu021_u:617: evameva mahāmate bālapṛthagjanāḥ kudṛṣṭidaṣṭā viṣamamatayo 'jñaiḥ praṇītaṃ sarvapraṇītamiti vakṣyanti //
S04bsu021_u:618_0: ye punaranye mahāmate śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā niḥsvabhāvaghanālātacakragandharvanagarānutpādamāyāmarīcyudakacandrasvapnasvabhāvabāhyacittadṛśyavikalpānādikālaprapañcadarśanena
S04bsu021_u:619: nacirātte mahāmate bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ saṃsāranirvāṇasamatāprāptā bhaviṣyanti /

S04bsu021_u:626: atha khalu bhagavān punareva mahāmatiṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - caturbhirmahāmate kāraṇaiścakṣurvijñānaṃ pravartate /
S04bsu021_u:631_1: udadheḥ pavanāhatā iva mahāmate viṣayapavanacittodadhitaraṃgā avyucchinnahetukriyālakṣaṇā
S04bsu021_u:632: saha taireva mahāmate pañcabhirvijñānakāyairhetuviṣayaparicchedalakṣaṇāvadhārakaṃ nāma manovijñānaṃ taddhetujaśarīraṃ pravartate /
S04bsu021_u:633: na ca teṣāṃ tasya caivaṃ bhavati - vayamatrānyonyahetukāḥ svacittadṛśyavikalpābhiniveśapravṛttā iti //
S04bsu021_u:635: tathā ca pravartamānāḥ pravartante yathā samāpannasyāpi yoginaḥ sūkṣmagativāsanāpravṛttā na prajñāyante /

S04bsu021_u:701: punaraparaṃ mahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena cittavijñānaprajñālakṣaṇavyavasthāyāṃ sthitvā upariṣṭādāryajñānalakṣaṇatrayayogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:704: yānyadhigamya yogī khañjagardabha iva cittaprajñājñānalakṣaṇaṃ hitvā jinasutāṣṭamīṃ prāpya bhūmiṃ taduttare lakṣaṇatraye yogamāpadyate //

S04bsu021_u:710_0: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punareva tasyā bodhisattvaparṣadaścittāśayavicāramājñāya
S04bsu021_u:710_2: paripṛcchati sma - deśayatu me bhagavānāryajñānavastupravicayaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyamaṣṭottarapadaśataprabhedāśrayam,
S04bsu021_u:711: yamāśritya tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ svasāmānyalakṣaṇapatitānāṃ parikalpitasvabhāvagatiprabhedaṃ deśayanti,
S04bsu021_u:713: bhagavānāha - iha mahāmate eke tīrthyātīrthyadṛṣṭayo nāstitvābhiniviṣṭā vikalpabuddhihetukṣayasvabhāvābhāvānnāsti śaśasya viṣāṇaṃ vikalpayanti /
S04bsu021_u:715: anye punarmahāmate bhūtaguṇāṇudravyasaṃsthānasaṃniveśaviśeṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā nāstiśaśaśṛṅgābhiniveśābhiniviṣṭā asti gośṛṅgamiti kalpayanti /
S04bsu021_u:718: dehabhogapratiṣṭhāgativikalpamātre mahāmate śaśaśṛṅgaṃ nāstyastivinivṛttaṃ na kalpayettathā mahāmate sarvabhāvānāṃ nāstyastivinivṛttaṃ na kalpayitavyam //
S04bsu021_u:719: ye punarmahāmate nāstyastivinivṛttā nāsti śaśaśṛṅgaṃ na kalpayanti,
S04bsu021_u:722: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - nanu bhagavan vikalpasyāpravṛttilakṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā anumimīmahe vikalpāpravṛttyapekṣaṃ tasya nāstitvam /
S04bsu021_u:723: bhagavānāha - na hi mahāmate vikalpāpravṛttyapekṣaṃ tasya nāstitvam /
S04bsu021_u:731_0: atha na bhavati mahāmate apekṣya nāstitvaṃ śaśaviṣāṇasya astitvamapekṣya nāstitvaṃ
S04bsu021_u:731_1: śaśaviṣāṇaṃ na kalpayitavyaṃ viṣamahetutvānmahāmate nāstyastitvam siddhirna bhavati
S04bsu021_u:732: anye punarmahāmate tīrthakaradṛṣṭayo rūpakāraṇasaṃsthānābhiniveśābhiniviṣṭā ākāśabhāvāparicchedakuśalā rūpamākāśabhāvavigataṃ paricchedaṃ dṛṣṭvā vikalpayanti /
S04bsu021_u:736: bhūtāni mahāmate pravartamānāni parasparasvalakṣaṇabhedabhinnāni ākāśe cāpratiṣṭhitāni /
S04bsu021_u:738: evameva śaśasya viṣāṇaṃ mahāmate goviṣāṇamapekṣya bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:739: goviṣāṇaṃ punarmahāmate aṇuśo vibhajyamānaṃ punarapyaṇavo vibhajyamānā aṇutvalakṣaṇe nāvatiṣṭhante /
S04bsu021_u:740: tasya kimapekṣya nāstitvaṃ bhavati? athānyadapekṣya vastu, tadapyevaṃdharmi //

S04bsu021_u:756_1: bhagavantamadhyeṣate sma - kathaṃ bhagavan svacittadṛśyadhārā viśudhyati yugapatkramavṛttyā vā?
S04bsu021_u:757: bhagavānāha - kramavṛttyā mahāmate svacittadṛśyadhārā viśudhyati na yugapat /
S04bsu021_u:758: tadyathā mahāmate āmraphalāni kramaśaḥ pacyante na yugapat,
S04bsu021_u:759: evameva mahāmate svacittadṛśyadhārā sattvānāṃ kramaśo viśudhyati [Vaidya_25] na yugapat /
S04bsu021_u:760: tadyathā mahāmate kumbhakāraḥ kramaśo bhāṇḍāni kurute na yugapat,
S04bsu021_u:761: evameva mahāmate tathāgataḥ sattvānāṃ svacittadṛśyadhārāṃ kramaśo viśodhayati na yugapat /
S04bsu021_u:762: tadyathā mahāmate pṛthivyāṃ tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatayaḥ kramavṛttyā virohanti na yugapat,

S04bsu021_u:771: evameva mahāmate niṣyandabuddho yugapatsattvagocaraṃ paripācya ākaniṣṭhabhavanavimānālayayogaṃ yogināmarpayati /
S04bsu021_u:777: tathā khyāyannapi mahāmate tadātmako na bhavati,
S04bsu021_u:778: evameva mahāmate paratantrasvabhāve parikalpitasvabhāve vividhavikalpacittavicitralakṣaṇaṃ khyāyate /
S04bsu021_u:788: punaraparaṃ mahāmate dvividhaṃ śrāvakayānanayaprabhedalakṣaṇaṃ yaduta pratyātmāryādhigamaviśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ ca bhāvavikalpasvabhāvābhiniveśalakṣaṇaṃ ca /
S04bsu021_u:791: svacittaṃ samādhāya dhyānavimokṣasamādhimārgaphalasamāpattivimuktivāsanācintyapariṇaticyutivigataṃ pratyātmāryagatilakṣaṇasukhavihāraṃ mahāmate adhigacchanti śrāvakāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:793_1: mahāsattvena nirodhasukhaṃ samāpattisukhaṃ ca sattvakriyāpekṣayā pūrvasvapraṇidhānābhinirhṛtatayā

S04bsu021_u:796: yaduta nīlapītoṣṇadravacalakaṭhināni mahābhūtānyakriyāpravṛttāni svasāmānyalakṣaṇayuktyāgamapramāṇasuvinibaddhāni dṛṣṭvā tatsvabhāvābhiniveśavikalpaḥ pravartate /
S04bsu021_u:799: etanmahāmate śrāvakāṇāṃ bhāvavikalpasvabhāvābhiniveśalakṣaṇaṃ yaduktam, idaṃ tatpratyuktam //
S04bsu021_u:800: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - nityamacintyaṃ ca bhagavatā pratyātmāryagatigocaraṃ paramārthagocaraṃ ca prabhāṣitam /

S04bsu021_u:813: yadi punarmahāmate tīrthakarāṇāṃ nityācintyatā kṛtakabhāvābhāvādanityatāṃ dṛṣṭvā anumānabuddhyā nityaṃ samāpyate,
S04bsu021_u:814: tenaiva hetunā mamāpi mahāmate kṛtakabhāvābhāvādanityatāṃ dṛṣṭvā nityamahetūpadeśāt //
S04bsu021_u:818: tatkasya hetoḥ? yaduta vāgvikalpamātraṃ hi mahāmate śaśaviṣāṇaṃ svahetulakṣaṇābhāvāt /
S04bsu021_u:825: saṃsāranirvāṇayoraviśeṣajñāḥ sarvabhāvavikalpābhāvādindriyāṇāmanāgataviṣayoparamācca mahāmate nirvāṇaṃ vikalpayanti na pratyātmagativijñānālayaṃ parāvṛttipūrvakaṃ mahāmate /
S04bsu021_u:826: ataste mahāmate mohapuruṣā yānatrayavādino bhavanti, na cittamātragatinirābhāasavādinaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:827: ataste mahāmate atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ svacittadṛśyagocarānabhijñā bāhyacittadṛśyagocarābhiniviṣṭāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:836_1: pravartamānaṃ bālā utpādasthitibhaṅgadṛṣṭidvayapatitāśayā utpādaṃ sarvabhāvānāṃ sadasatorvikalpayanti /
S04bsu021_u:840: yaduta śrāvakayānābhisamayagotraṃ pratyekabuddhayānābhisamayagotraṃ tathāgatayānābhisamayagotram aniyataikataragotram agotraṃ ca pañcamam /
S04bsu021_u:845: yaḥ śrāvakayānābhisamayaṃ dṛṣṭvā ṣaṭpañcamyāṃ bhūmau paryutthānakleśaprahīṇo vāsanakleśāprahīṇo 'cintyācyutigataḥ samyaksiṃhanādaṃ nadati - kṣīṇā me jātiḥ,
S04bsu021_u:849: anye punarmahāmate kāraṇādhīnān sarvadharmān dṛṣṭvā nirvāṇagatibuddhayo bhavanti /
S04bsu021_u:852: atra te mahāmate kudṛṣṭivyāvṛttyarthaṃ yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ //
S04bsu021_u:857: sa pratyekabuddhayānābhisamayagotraka iti viditvā pratyekabuddhayānābhisamayānurūpā kathā karaṇīyā /

S04bsu021_u:897: nimittalakṣaṇābhiniveśaḥ punaryaduta teṣveva ādhyātmikabāhyeṣu dharmeṣu svasāmānyalakṣaṇaparijñānāvabodhaḥ /

S04bsu021_u:926: atha khalu bhagavān punarapi mahāmaterbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyādhyeṣaṇāṃ viditvā imāṃ gāthāmabhāṣata -

S04bsu021_u:968: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
S04bsu021_u:972: yaduta lakṣaṇaśūnyatā bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā apracaritaśūnyatā pracaritaśūnyatā sarvadharmanirabhilāpyaśūnyatā paramārthāryajñānamahāśūnyatā itaretaraśūnyatā ca saptamī //
S04bsu021_u:973: [Vaidya_32] tatra mahāmate lakṣaṇaśūnyatā katamā? yaduta svasāmānyalakṣaṇaśūnyāḥ sarvabhāvāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:978: yaduta svayaṃ svabhāvābhāvotpattito mahāmate bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā bhavati sarvadharmāṇām /
S04bsu021_u:980: apracaritaśūnyatā punarmahāmate katamā? yaduta apracaritapūrvaṃ nirvāṇaṃ skandheṣu /
S04bsu021_u:983: yaduta skandhā ātmātmīyarahitā hetuyuktikriyākarmayogaiḥ pravartamānāḥ pravartante /
S04bsu021_u:991: itaretaraśūnyatā punarmahāmate katamā? yaduta yadyatra nāsti tattena śūnyamityucyate /
S04bsu021_u:992: tadyathā mahāmate śṛgālamātuḥ prāsāde hastigavaiḍakādyā na santi /
S04bsu021_u:995: na ca punarmahāmate prāsādaḥ prāsādabhāvato nāsti, bhikṣavaśca bhikṣubhāvato na santi /

S04bsu021_u:1003: na svayamutpadyate, na ca punarmahāmate te notpadyante anyatra samādhyavasthāyām /

S04bsu021_u:1027: tasmāttarhi mahāmate arthānusāriṇā bhavitavyaṃ na deśanābhilāpābhiniviṣṭena //
S04bsu021_u:1028: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - tathāgatagarbhaḥ punarbhagavatā sūtrāntapāṭhe 'nuvarṇitaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:1029: sa ca kila tvayā prakṛtiprabhāsvaraviśuddhyādiviśuddha eva varṇyate dvātriṃśallakṣaṇadharaḥ sarvasattvadehāntargataḥ /
S04bsu021_u:1030: mahārghamūlyaratnaṃ malinavastupariveṣṭitamiva skandhadhātvāyatanavastuveṣṭito rāgadveṣamohābhūtaparikalpamalamalino nityo dhruvaḥ śivaḥ śāśvataśca bhagavatā varṇitaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:1032: tīrthakarā api bhagavan nityaḥ kartā nirguṇo vibhuravyaya ityātmavādopadeśaṃ kurvanti //

S04bsu021_u:1034_1: padārthānāṃ tathāgatagarbhopadeśaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bālānāṃ

S04bsu021_u:1036: tadyathā mahāmate kumbhakāra ekasmānmṛtparamāṇurāśervividhāni bhāṇḍāni karoti hastaśilpadaṇḍodakasūtraprayatnayogāt,
S04bsu021_u:1037_1: vividhaiḥ prajñopāyakauśalyayogairgarbhopadeśena vā nairātmyopadeśena vā kumbhakāravaccitraiḥ

S04bsu021_u:1061: tadyathā mahāmate mano 'pratihataṃ girikuḍyanadīvṛkṣādiṣvanekāni yojanaśatasahasrāṇi pūrvadṛṣṭānubhūtān viṣayānanusmaran svacittaprabandhāvicchinnaśarīramapratihatagati pravartate,

S04bsu021_u:1071: yena hetupratyayalakṣaṇāvabodhena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā sadasaddṛṣṭivikalparahitāḥ sarvabhāvanākramaṃ yugapadutpattiṃ na kalpayeyuḥ //

S04bsu021_u:1379: tadyathā mahāmate mṛgatṛṣṇālātacakrakeśoṇḍukagandharvanagaramāyāsvapnapratibimbākṣapuruṣā loke 'vidvadbhirviparyasyante, na tu vidvadbhiḥ /

S04bsu021_u:1395: nānyatra mahāmate āryā asyāṃ bhrāntau yakiṃcitsaṃjñino bhavanti nāryajñānavastusaṃjñinaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:1397: sā punarbhrāntirviparyāsāviparyāsena vikalpyamānā gotradvayāvahā bhavati yaduta āryagotrasya vā bālapṛthagjanagotrasya vā /
S04bsu021_u:1399: tatra kathaṃ punarmahāmate bālairbhrāntirvikalpyamānā śrāvakayānagotraṃ janayati?
S04bsu021_u:1401: evaṃ mahāmate sā bhrāntiḥ śrāvakayānagotrāvahā bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:1402: tatra kathaṃ punarmahāmate saiva bhrāntirvikalpyamānā pratyekabuddhayānagotrāvahā bhavati?
S04bsu021_u:1403: yaduta tasyā eva mahāmate bhrānteḥ svasāmānyalakṣaṇābhiniveśāsaṃsargataḥ pratyekabuddhayānagotrāvahā bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:1404: tatra kathaṃ [Vaidya_45] punarmahāmate paṇḍitaiḥ saiva bhrāntirvikalpyamānā buddhayānagotrāvahā bhavati?
S04bsu021_u:1413: ata etaduktaṃ bhavati mahāmate - tathatāpi cittavinirmukteti /
S04bsu021_u:1414: asyaiva mahāmate padasyābhidyotanārthamidamuktaṃ mayā - kalpanaiśca vivarjitaṃ sarvakalpanāvirahitamiti yāvaduktaṃ bhavati //

S04bsu021_u:2102: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantaṃ sarvadharmasaṃdhyarthaparimocanārthamadhyeṣate sma - deśayatu me bhagavān,
S04bsu021_u:2103: deśayatu me tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃdhyasaṃdhilakṣaṇam,
S04bsu021_u:2104: yena saṃdhyasaṃdhilakṣaṇena suprativibhāgābhividdhena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvasaṃdhyasaṃdhyupāyakuśalā yathārutārthābhiniveśasaṃdhau na prapateyuḥ /
S04bsu021_u:2105_0: sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃdhyasaṃdhikauśalena vāgakṣaraprativikalpanaṃ ca vinihatya buddhyā
S04bsu021_u:2108: tena hi mahāmate śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru /
S04bsu021_u:2110: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
S04bsu021_u:2123: ete cānye ca mahāmate bālapṛthagjanānāṃ svavikalpasaṃdhayaḥ,
S04bsu021_u:2124_0: yāṃ saṃdhiṃ saṃdhāya bālapṛthagjanāḥ prativikalpayamānāḥ kauśeyakrimaya iva svavikalpadṛṣṭisaṃdhisūtreṇa
S04bsu021_u:2125: na cātra mahāmate kaścitsaṃdhirna saṃdhilakṣaṇaṃ viviktadarśanātsarvadharmāṇām /
S04bsu021_u:2126: vikalpasyāpravṛttatvānmahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmeṣu viviktadarśī viharati //
S04bsu021_u:2128: nātra kaścinmahāmate badhyate na ca mucyate,
S04bsu021_u:2131: punaraparaṃ mahāmate trayaḥ saṃdhayo bālānāṃ pṛthagjanānāṃ yaduta rāgo dveṣo mohaśca /
S04bsu021_u:2132: tṛṣṇā ca paunarbhavikī nandīrāgasahagatā yāṃ saṃdhāya gatisaṃdhayaḥ prajāyante /
S04bsu021_u:2133: tatra saṃdhisaṃdhānaṃ sattvānāṃ gatipañcakaṃ saṃdhervyucchedānmahāmate nasaṃdhirnāsaṃdhilakṣaṇaṃ prajñāyate /
S04bsu021_u:2142: punarapi mahāmatirāha - yatpunaretaduktaṃ bhagavatā - yena yena vikalpena ye ye bhāvā vikalpyante,
S04bsu021_u:2143: na hi sa teṣāṃ svabhāvo bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:2145: tadyadi bhagavan parikalpita [Vaidya_67] evāsau na bhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇāvadhāraṇam,
S04bsu021_u:2146: nanu te bhagavan evaṃ bruvataḥ saṃkleśavyavadānābhāvaḥ prasajyate parikalpitasvabhāvabhāvitatvātsarvadharmāṇām /
S04bsu021_u:2148: na mahāmate yathā bālapṛthagjanairbhāvasvabhāvo vikalpyate, tathā bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:2150: kiṃ tu yathā mahāmate āryairbhāvasvabhāvo 'vadhāryate āryeṇa jñānena āryeṇa darśanena āryeṇa prajñāacakṣuṣā tathā bhāvasvabhāvo bhavati //
S04bsu021_u:2151: mahāmatirāha - tadyadi bhagavan yathā āryairāryeṇa jñānena āryeṇa darśanena āryeṇa prajñācakṣuṣā na divyamāṃsacakṣuṣā bhāvasvabhāvo 'vadhāryate tathā bhavati,
S04bsu021_u:2154: na ca te bhagavan viparyastāḥ nāviparyastāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:2156: āryairapi bhagavan yathā vastu vikalpyate, na tathā bhavati svalakṣaṇaviṣayāgocaratvāt /
S04bsu021_u:2157: sa teṣāmapi bhagavan bhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇaḥ parikalpitasvabhāva eva khyāyate hetvahetuvyapadeśāt /
S04bsu021_u:2158: yaduta bhāvasvalakṣaṇadṛṣṭipatitatvādanyeṣāṃ gocaro bhavati na yathā teṣām /
S04bsu021_u:2161: sa ca kathaṃ parikalpena prativikalpyamāno na tathā bhaviṣyati yathā parikalpyate?
S04bsu021_u:2162: anyadeva bhagavan prativikalpasya lakṣaṇam, anyadeva svabhāvalakṣaṇam /
S04bsu021_u:2164: te ca parasparaṃ parikalpyamāne bālapṛthagjanairna tathā bhaviṣyataḥ /
S04bsu021_u:2166: yathā prativikalpena vikalpyante tathā na vidyante //
S04bsu021_u:2167: kimidaṃ bhagavan sattvānāṃ tvayā nāstyastitvadṛṣṭiṃ vinivārya vastusvabhāvābhiniveśena āryajñānagocaraviṣayābhiniveśānnāstitvadṛṣṭiḥ punarnipātyate,
S04bsu021_u:2169: bhagavānāha - na mayā mahāmate viviktadharmopadeśābhāvaḥ kriyate,
S04bsu021_u:2171: kiṃ tu utrāsapadavivarjanārthaṃ sattvānāṃ mahāmate mayā anādikālabhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇābhiniviṣṭānāmāryajñānavastusvabhāvābhiniveśalakṣaṇadṛṣṭyā viviktadharmopadeśaḥ kriyate /
S04bsu021_u:2175: bhrānternirnimittadṛṣṭayo vimokṣatrayādhigatayāthātathyamudrāsumudritā bhāvasvabhāveṣu pratyātmādhigatayā buddhyā pratyakṣavihāriṇo bhaviṣyanti nāstyastitvavastudṛṣṭivivarjitāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:2176: punaraparaṃ mahāmate anutpannāḥ sarvadharmā iti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pratijñā na karaṇīyā /
S04bsu021_u:2178: anutpannān [Vaidya_68] sarvadharmān pratijñāya pratibruvan mahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratijñāyā hīyate /
S04bsu021_u:2179: yā pratijñā - anutpannāḥ sarvadharmā iti, sāsya pratijñā hīyate, pratijñāyāstadapekṣotpattitvāt /
S04bsu021_u:2181: anutpannāḥ sarvadharmā iti sa vādaḥ prahīyate /
S04bsu021_u:2183: sā hi mahāmate pratijñā sarvabhāvābhyantarā sadasatoranutpattilakṣaṇāt /
S04bsu021_u:2184: yadi mahāmate tayā pratijñayā anutpannayā anutpannāḥ sarvabhāvā iti pratijñāṃ kurvanti,
S04bsu021_u:2187: anutpannasvabhāvalakṣaṇā hi mahāmate teṣāṃ pratijñā bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:2189: bahudoṣaduṣṭatvādavayavānāṃ parasparahetuvilakṣaṇakṛtakatvācca avayavānāṃ pratijñā na karaṇīyā - yaduta anutpannāḥ sarvadharmāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:2190: evaṃ śūnyā asvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā iti mahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pratijñā na karaṇīyā /
S04bsu021_u:2191: kiṃ tu mahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena māyāsvapnavatsarvabhāvopadeśaḥ karaṇīyo dṛśyādṛśyalakṣaṇatvāt /
S04bsu021_u:2197: Lank_3.48 na svabhāvo na vijñaptirna vastu na ca ālayaḥ /

S04bsu021_u:2231: jñeye sati bhagavan jñānaṃ pravartate nābhāvāt /
S04bsu021_u:2236: bhagavānāha - na hi tanmahāmate evamajñānaṃ bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:2238: na caitatsaṃdhāyoktaṃ mayā - yadā tvālambyamarthaṃ nopalabhate jñānaṃ tadā vijñaptimātravyavasthānaṃ bhavatīti /
S04bsu021_u:2242: na ca tārkikā anādikālabhāvābhāvaprapañcavāsitamataya evaṃ prajānanti /

S04bsu021_u:2247: Lank_3.58 vidyamānaṃ hi ālambyaṃ yadi jñānaṃ na paśyati /

S04bsu021_u:2270_1: samyaksaṃbuddhena ekasmin kāle ekasmin samaye yathā lokāyatiko vicitramantrapratibhāno
S04bsu021_u:2270_2: na sevitavyo na bhaktavyo na paryupāsitavyaḥ,
S04bsu021_u:2271: yaṃ ca sevamānasya lokāmiṣasaṃgraho bhavati na dharmasaṃgraha iti /
S04bsu021_u:2273: yaṃ ca sevamānasya lokāmiṣasaṃgraho bhavati na dharmasaṃgrahaḥ?
S04bsu021_u:2274: bhagavānāha - vicitramantrapratibhāno mahāmate lokāyatiko vicitrairhetupadavyañjanairbālān vyāmohayati na yuktiyuktaṃ nārthopasaṃhitam /
S04bsu021_u:2276: etena mahāmate kāraṇena lokāyatiko vicitramantrapratibhāna ityucyate /
S04bsu021_u:2278: svayaṃ sarvadharmānavabodhādantadvayapatitayā dṛṣṭyā bālān vyāmohayati, svātmānaṃ ca kṣiṇoti /
S04bsu021_u:2282: tacchiṣyeṇa nāgaveśarūpadhāriṇā svarge indasabhāyāṃ pratijñāṃ kṛtvā tava vā sahasrāro ratho bhajyatāṃ mama vā ekaikanāgabhāvasya phaṇācchedo bhavatviti /
S04bsu021_u:2283: sahadharmeṇa ca nāgaveśadhāriṇā lokāyatikaśiṣyeṇa devānāmindraṃ vijitya sahasrāraṃ rathaṃ bhaṅktvā punarapīmaṃ lokamāgataḥ /
S04bsu021_u:2284: evamidaṃ mahāmate lokāyatikavicitrahetudṛṣṭāntopanibaddhaṃ yena tiryañco 'pyadhītya devāsuralokaṃ vicitrapadavyañjanairvyāmohayati /
S04bsu021_u:2287: na sevitavyo na bhajitavyo na paryupāsitavyaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:2288: śarīrabuddhiviṣayopalabdhimātraṃ hi mahāmate lokāyatikairdeśyate vicitraiḥ padavyañjanaiḥ /
S04bsu021_u:2290: kiṃ tu paścime loke paścimāyāṃ pañcāśatyāṃ bhinnasaṃhitaṃ bhaviṣyati kutarkahetudṛṣṭipraṇītatvāt /
S04bsu021_u:2292: evadeva mahāmate lokāyataṃ bhinnasaṃhitaṃ vicitrahetūpanibaddhaṃ tīrthakarairdeśyate svakāraṇābhiniveśābhiniviṣṭaiḥ, na svanayaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:2295: na svanayaṃ ca na prajānanti mohohāllokāyatamidamiti //
S04bsu021_u:2296: mahāmatirāha - yadi bhagavan sarvatīrthakarā lokāyatameva vicitraiḥ padavyañjanairdṛṣṭāntopasaṃhārairdeśayanti,
S04bsu021_u:2298: atha kiṃ bhagavānapi lokāyatameva deśayati āgatāgatānāṃ nānādeśasaṃnipatitānāṃ devāsuramanuṣyāṇāṃ vicitraiḥ padavyañjanaiḥ,
S04bsu021_u:2300: bhagavānāha - nāhaṃ mahāmate lokāyataṃ deśayāmi na cāyavyayam /
S04bsu021_u:2302: tatra āyo nāma mahāmate utpādarāśiḥ samūhāgamādutpadyate /
S04bsu021_u:2311: atha yenāhaṃ tena lokāyatiko brāhmaṇa upasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:2312: upasaṃkramya akṛtāvakāśa eva māmevamāha - sarvaṃ bho gautama kṛtakam /
S04bsu021_u:2313: tasyāhaṃ mahāmate evamāha - sarvaṃ bho brāhmaṇa yadi kṛtakam, idaṃ prathamaṃ lokāyatam /
S04bsu021_u:2315: yadi brāhmaṇa sarvamakṛtakam , idaṃ dvitīyaṃ lokāyatam /
S04bsu021_u:2316: evaṃ sarvamanityaṃ sarvaṃ nityaṃ sarvamutpādyaṃ sarvamanutpādyam /
S04bsu021_u:2318: punarapi mahāmate māmevamāha brāhmaṇo lokāyatikaḥ - sarvaṃ bho gautama ekatvaṃ sarvamanyatvaṃ sarvamubhayatvaṃ sarvamanubhayatvaṃ sarvaṃ kāraṇādhīnaṃ vicitrahetūipapattidarśanāt /
S04bsu021_u:2320: punarapi bho gautama sarvamavyākṛtaṃ sarvaṃ vyākṛtam,
S04bsu021_u:2323: asti paro loko nāsti paro lokaḥ,
S04bsu021_u:2329: tasyaitaduktaṃ mahāmate mahā - yadi bho brāhmaṇa evam,
S04bsu021_u:2330: idamapi brāhmaṇa lokāyatameva bhavatīti, na madīyam /
S04bsu021_u:2335: ahaṃ bhe brāhmaṇa na hetuvādī nāhetuvādī anyatra vikalpameva grāhyagrāhakabhāvena prajñāpya pratītyasamutpādaṃ deśayāmi /
S04bsu021_u:2336: na ca tvādṛśā anye vā budhyante ātmagrāhapatitayā saṃtatyā /
S04bsu021_u:2337: nirvāṇākāśanirodhānāṃ mahāmate tattvameva nopalabhyate saṃkhyāyām, kutaḥ punaḥ kṛtakatvam //
S04bsu021_u:2338: punarapi mahāmate lokāyatiko brāhmaṇa evamāha - ajñānatṛṣṇākarmahetukamidaṃ bho gautama tribhavam, athāhetukam?
S04bsu021_u:2343: punaraparaṃ mahāmate lokāyatiko brāhmaṇo māmetadavocat - asti bho gautama kiṃcidyanna lokāyatam?
S04bsu021_u:2344: madīyameva bho gautama sarvatīrthakaraiḥ prasiddhaṃ vicitraiḥ padavyañjanairhetudṛṣṭāntopasaṃhārairdeśyate /
S04bsu021_u:2345: asti bho brāhmaṇa yanna tvadīyaṃ na ca na prasiddhaṃ deśyate na ca na vicitraiḥ padavyañjanairna ca nārthopasaṃhitameva /

S04bsu021_u:2347: asti ca bho brāhmaṇa alokāyataṃ yatra sarvatīrthakarāṇāṃ tava ca buddhirna gāhate bāhyabhāvādasadbhūtavikalpaprapañcābhiniviṣṭānām /
S04bsu021_u:2348: yaduta vikalpasyāpravṛttiḥ sadasataḥ svacittadṛśyamātrāvabodhādvikalpo na pravartate /

S04bsu021_u:2403: yathā tīrthakarā nirvāṇaṃ vikalpayanti, na ca bhavati teṣāṃ vikalpānurupaṃ nirvāṇam /
S04bsu021_u:2404: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
S04bsu021_u:2405: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat - tatra kecittāvanmahāmate tīrthakarāḥ skandhadhātvāyatananirodhādviṣayavairāgyānnivaidharmyādarśanāccittacaittakalāpo na pravartate /
S04bsu021_u:2409: anye punardeśāntarasthānagamanaṃ mokṣa iti varṇayanti viṣayavikalpoparamādiṣu pavanavat /
S04bsu021_u:2412: anye punarvarṇayanti vividhanimittavikalpo duḥkhajanmavāhaka iti svacittadṛśyamātrākuśalāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:2417: anye punarmahāmate tīrthakarā durvidagdhabuddhayaḥ prakṛtipuruṣāntaradarśanādguṇapariṇāmakartṛtvācca nirvāṇaṃ kalpayanti /
S04bsu021_u:2421: anye anyonyapravṛtto 'yaṃ saṃbhavo jagata iti na kāraṇataḥ /
S04bsu021_u:2422: sa ca kāraṇābhiniveśa eva, na cāvabudhyante mohāt, tadanavabodhānnirvāṇaṃ kalpayanti /
S04bsu021_u:2425: anye svabhāvataḥ pravṛttito mayūravaicitryavividharatnākarakaṇṭakataikṣṇyavadbhāvānāṃ svabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā nirvāṇaṃ vikalpayanti /
S04bsu021_u:2435: evamanyānyapi yāni tārkikaiḥ kutīrthyapraṇītāni tānyayuktiyuktāni vidvadbhiḥ parivarjitāni /
S04bsu021_u:2436: sarve 'pyete mahāmate antadvayapatitayā saṃtatyā nirvāṇaṃ kalpayanti /
S04bsu021_u:2438: na cātra kaścitpravartate vā nivartate vā /
S04bsu021_u:2443: atra tvayā mahāmate śikṣitvā anyaiśca bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ sarvatīrthakaranirvāṇadṛṣṭirvyāvartanīyā //
S04bsu021_u:2448: tīrthyā mokṣaṃ vikalpenti na ca mokṣo hi vidyate //
S04bsu021_u:2449: Lank_3.71 anekabhedabhinno hi tīrthyānāṃ dṛśyate nayaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:2453: Lank_3.73 jalpaprapañcābhiratā hi bālāstattve na kurvanti matiṃ viśālām /
S04bsu021_u:2454: jalpo hi traidhātukaduḥkhayonistattvaṃ hi duḥkhasya vināśahetuḥ //
S04bsu021_u:2455: Lank_3.74 yathā hi darpaṇe rūpaṃ dṛśyate na ca vidyate /
S04bsu021_u:2461: Lank_3.77 vikalpamātraṃ tribhavaṃ bāhyamarthaṃ na vidyate /
S04bsu021_u:2462: vikalpaṃ dṛśyate citraṃ na ca bālairvibhāvyate //
S04bsu021_u:2463: Lank_3.78 sūtre sūtre vikalpoktaṃ saṃjñānāmāntareṇa ca /
S04bsu021_u:2465: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - deśayatu me bhagavāṃstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ svabuddhabuddhatām,
S04bsu021_u:2466: yena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāstathāgatasvakuśalāḥ svamātmānaṃ parāṃścāvabodhayeyuḥ /
S04bsu021_u:2467: bhagavānāha - tena hi mahāmate tvameva paripṛccha /
S04bsu021_u:2469: mahāmatirāha - kiṃ punarbhagavan tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho 'kṛtakaḥ kṛtakaḥ kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇamabhidhānamabhidheyaṃ buddhirboddhavyaḥ,
S04bsu021_u:2471: bhagavānāha - na mahāmate tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha evamādyaiḥ padaniruktairakṛtako na kṛtakaṃ na kāryaṃ na kāraṇam /
S04bsu021_u:2473: yadi hi mahāmate tathāgataḥ kṛtakaḥ syāt, anityatvaṃ syāt /
S04bsu021_u:2475: aniṣṭaṃ caitanmama ca anyeṣāṃ ca tathāgatānām /
S04bsu021_u:2479: yacca mahāmate na kāryaṃ na kāraṇaṃ tanna sannāsat /
S04bsu021_u:2483: vandhyāputro hi mahāmate vāgmātraṃ na cātuṣkoṭikapatitaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:2486: yadapyuktaṃ mayā nirātmānaḥ sarvadharmā iti, tasyāpyarthaṃ niboddhavyaṃ mahāmate /
S04bsu021_u:2488: svātmanā sarvadharmā vidyante na parātmanā gośvavat /
S04bsu021_u:2489: tadyathā mahāmate na gobhāvo 'śvātmako na cāśvabhāvo gavātmakaḥ,
S04bsu021_u:2493: evameva mahāmate sarvadharmā na ca svalakṣaṇena na saṃvidyante /
S04bsu021_u:2495: tena ca bālapṛthagjanairnirātmārthatā avabudhyate vikalpamupādāya, na tvavikalpam /
S04bsu021_u:2498: yadyananyaḥ skandhebhyaḥ syāt, anityaḥ syāt kṛtatvātskandhānām /
S04bsu021_u:2499: athānyaḥ syāt, dvaye satyanyathā bhavati goviṣāṇavat //
S04bsu021_u:2501: dakṣiṇaṃ hi mahāmate goviṣāṇaṃ vāmasyānyadbhavati, vāmamapi dakṣiṇasya /
S04bsu021_u:2514_0: yaddhi mahāmate na nityaṃ nānityaṃ na kāryaṃ na kāraṇaṃ na saṃskṛtaṃ nāsaṃskṛtaṃ
S04bsu021_u:2514_1: na buddhirna boddhavyaṃ na lakṣyaṃ na lakṣaṇaṃ na skandhā na skandhebhyo 'nyat nābhidheyaṃ
S04bsu021_u:2520: ākāśaṃ ca mahāmate na kāryaṃ na kāraṇam /
S04bsu021_u:2521: yacca na kāryaṃ na kāraṇaṃ tannirālambyam /
S04bsu021_u:2527: Lank_3.79 pramāṇendriyanirmuktaṃ na kāryaṃ nāpi kāraṇam /
S04bsu021_u:2529: Lank_3.80 skandhān pratītya saṃbuddho na dṛṣṭaḥ kenacitkvacit /
S04bsu021_u:2530: yo na dṛṣṭaḥ kvacitkenacitkathaṃ tasya vibhāvanā //
S04bsu021_u:2531: Lank_3.81 na kṛtako nākṛtako na kāryaṃ nāpi kāraṇam /
S04bsu021_u:2532: na ca skandhā na cāskandhā na cāpyanyatra saṃkarāt //
S04bsu021_u:2533: Lank_3.82 na hi yo yena bhāvena kalpyamāno na dṛśyate /
S04bsu021_u:2534: na taṃ nāstyeva gantavyaṃ dharmāṇāmeva dharmatā //
S04bsu021_u:2536: ato nāsti na gantavyamastitvaṃ na ca kalpayet //
S04bsu021_u:2540: tadā samyakprapaśyanti na te dūṣenti nāyakān //
S04bsu021_u:2541: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - deśayatu me bhagavān,
S04bsu021_u:2546: yadbhagavānevamāha - aniruddhā anutpannāśca bhagavatā [Vaidya_78] sarvadharmā deśyante sadasatpakṣādarśanāt /
S04bsu021_u:2547: yadyanutpannāḥ sarvadharmā iti bhagavan dharmagrahaṇaṃ na prāpnoti, ajātatvātsarvadharmāṇām /
S04bsu021_u:2549: bhagavānāha - tena hi mahāmate śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru /
S04bsu021_u:2551: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
S04bsu021_u:2552: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat - na hi mahāmate abhāvastathāgato na ca sarvadharmāṇāmanirodhānutpādagrahaṇam /
S04bsu021_u:2553: na pratyayo 'pekṣitavyo na ca nirarthakamanutpādagrahaṇaṃ kriyate mayā /
S04bsu021_u:2554: kiṃ tu mahāmate manomayadharmakāyasya tathāgatasyaitadadhivacanaṃ yatra sarvatīrthakaraśrāvakapratyekabuddhasaptabhūmipratiṣṭhitānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāmaviṣayaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:2562: ityevamādyānāṃ bhāvānāmekaikasya bhāvasya bahavaḥ paryāyavācakāḥ śabdā bhavanti vikalpitāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:2565: evaṃ mahāmate ahamapi sahāyāṃ lokadhātau tribhirnāmāsaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrairbālānāṃ śravaṇāvabhāsamāgacchāmi /
S04bsu021_u:2566: taiścābhilapanti mām, na ca prajānanti tathāgatasyaite nāmaparyāyā iti /
S04bsu021_u:2569_0: nāyakaṃ vināyakaṃ pariṇāyakaṃ buddhamṛṣiṃ vṛṣabhaṃ brahmāṇaṃ viṣṇumīśvaraṃ pradhānaṃ
S04bsu021_u:2569_1: kapilaṃ bhūtāntamariṣṭaneminaṃ somaṃ bhāskaraṃ rāmaṃ vyāsaṃ śukamindraṃ baliṃ varuṇamiti caike saṃjānanti /
S04bsu021_u:2571_0: śūnyatāṃ tathatāṃ satyatāṃ bhūtatāṃ bhūtakoṭiṃ dharmadhātuṃ nirvāṇaṃ nityaṃ samatāmadvayamanirodhamanimittaṃ
S04bsu021_u:2571_1: pratyayaṃ buddhahetūpadeśaṃ vimokṣaṃ mārgasatyāni sarvajñaṃ jinaṃ manomayamiti caike saṃjānanti /
S04bsu021_u:2572: evamādibhirmahāmate paripūrṇaṃ tribhirnāmāsaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrairanūnairanadhikairihānyeṣu ca lokadhātuṣu māṃ janāḥ saṃjānante udakacandra ivāpraviṣṭanirgatam /
S04bsu021_u:2573: na ca bālā avabudhyante dvayāntapatitayā saṃtatyā /
S04bsu021_u:2574: atha ca satkurvanti gurukurvanti mānayanti pūjayanti ca māṃ padārthaniruktyakuśalā abhinnasaṃjñāḥ,
S04bsu021_u:2576: anirodhānutpādamabhāvaṃ kalpayiṣyanti na ca tathāgatanāmapadaparyāyāntaramindraśakrapuraṃdaraṃ na svanayapratyavasthānapāṭhamadhimokṣanti,
S04bsu021_u:2578: evaṃ ca mahāmate vakṣyanti te mohapuruṣāḥ - yathāruta evārthaḥ, ananyo 'rtho rutāditi /
S04bsu021_u:2579: tatkasya hetoḥ? yaduta arthasyāśarīratvādrutādanyo 'rtho na bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:2581: na tvevaṃ jñāsyanti mahāmate yathā rutamutpannapradhvaṃsi, artho 'nutpannapradhvaṃsī /
S04bsu021_u:2584: na ca mahāmate tathāgatā akṣarapatitaṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti /
S04bsu021_u:2586: anyatra akṣarapatitāśayaḥ punarmahāmate yo 'kṣarapatitaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
S04bsu021_u:2589: ata etasmātkāraṇānmahāmate uktaṃ deśanāpāṭhe mayā anyaiśca buddhabodhisattvaiḥ yathaikamapyakṣaraṃ tathāgatā nodāharanti na pratyāharantīti /
S04bsu021_u:2596: ata etasmātkāraṇānmahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena deśanāpāṭharutānabhiniviṣṭena bhavitavyam /
S04bsu021_u:2599: sattvāśayapravṛttatvānnānādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmadeśanā kriyate cittamanomanovijñānavyāvṛttyarthaṃ mayā anyaiśca tathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ,
S04bsu021_u:2601: arthapratiśaraṇena mahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bhavitavyaṃ na vyañjanapratiśaraṇena /
S04bsu021_u:2602: vyañjanānusārī mahāmate kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā svātmānaṃ ca nāśayati,
S04bsu021_u:2604: kudṛṣṭipatitayā saṃtatyā svapakṣaṃ vibhrāmyate kutīrthakaiḥ sarvadharmabhūmisvalakṣaṇākuśalaiḥ padaniruktyanabhijñaiḥ //
S04bsu021_u:2606: tataḥ svātmānaṃ ca samyaganimittasukhena prīṇayanti, parāṃśca samyaṅmahāyāne pratiṣṭhāpayanti /
S04bsu021_u:2607: mahāyāne ca mahāmate samyakparigṛhyamāṇe buddhaśrāvakapratyekabuddhabodhisattvānāṃ parigrahaḥ kṛto bhavati /
S04bsu021_u:2612_0: atasteṣu viśiṣṭāyatanapratilambheṣu bodhisattvā mahāsattvā upapattiṃ parigṛhya mahāyāne
S04bsu021_u:2615: tena na mahāmate kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā yathārutārthābhiniveśakuśalena bhavitavyam /
S04bsu021_u:2620: evameva mahāmate bālajātīyā iva bālapṛthagjanavargā yathārutāṅgulyagrābhiniveśābhiniviṣṭā eva kālaṃ kariṣyanti,
S04bsu021_u:2622: tadyathā mahāmate annaṃ bhojyaṃ bālānāṃ ca kaścidanabhisaṃskṛtaṃ paribhoktum /
S04bsu021_u:2627: ata etena kāraṇena mahāmate arthābhiyogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:2631: bāhuśrutyaṃ ca nāma mahāmate yaduta arthakauśalyaṃ na rutakauśalyam /
S04bsu021_u:2633: yathā svayaṃ ca na patati parāṃśca na pātayati /
S04bsu021_u:2637: punaraparaṃ mahāmatirbuddhādhiṣṭhānādhiṣṭhita evamāha - na bhagavatā anirodhānutpādadarśanena kiṃcidviśiṣyate /
S04bsu021_u:2640: tīrthakarā api bhagavan kāraṇapratyayahetukīṃ jagata utpattiṃ varṇayanti /
S04bsu021_u:2649: yāṃ tāṃ gatiṃ gatvā bhūto bhūtasvabhāvaṃ na vijahāti /
S04bsu021_u:2652: viśeṣo vātra vaktavyo yena tathāgatavādo viśeṣyate, na sarvatīrthakaravādaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:2653: aviśiṣyamāṇe bhagavan svavāde tīrthakarāṇāmapi buddhaprasaṅgaḥ syādanirodhānutpādahetutvāt /
S04bsu021_u:2654: asthānamanavakāśaṃ coktaṃ bhagavatā yadekatra lokadhātau bahavastathāgatā utpadyeranniti /
S04bsu021_u:2656: bhagavānāha - na mama mahāmate anirodhānutpādastīrthakarānutpādānirodhavādena tulyo nāpyutpādānityavādena /
S04bsu021_u:2657: tatkasya hetoḥ? tīrthakarāṇāṃ hi mahāmate bhāvasvabhāvo vidyata evānutpannāvikaralakṣaṇaprāptaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:2659: mama tu mahāmate sadasatpakṣavigata utpādabhaṅgavirahito na bhāvo nābhāavaḥ,
S04bsu021_u:2666: tadyathā mahāmate kaścidgandharvanagare bālajātīyo māyāpuruṣasattvasārthavaicitryaṃ praviaśantaṃ vā nirgacchantaṃ vā kalpayet - amī praviṣṭā amī nirgatāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:2667: na ca tatra kaścitpraviṣṭo vā nirgato vā /
S04bsu021_u:2668: atha yāvadeva vikalpavibhramabhāva eṣaḥ, teṣāmevameva mahāmate utpādānutpādavibhrama eṣa bālānām /
S04bsu021_u:2670: na ca māyāpuruṣa utpadyate vā nirudhyate vā bhāvābhāvākiṃcitkaratvāt /
S04bsu021_u:2672: anyatra vitathapatitayā saṃjñayā bālā utpādanirodhaṃ kalpayanti na tvāryāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:2673: tatra vitathamiti mahāmate na tathā yathā bhāvasvabhāvaḥ kalpyate /
S04bsu021_u:2677: ata etasmātkāraṇānmahāmate animittadarśanameva śreyo na nimittadarśanam /
S04bsu021_u:2680: tatra nirvāṇamiti mahāmate yathābhūtārthasthānadarśanaṃ vikalpacittacaittakalāpasya parāvṛttipūrvakam /
S04bsu021_u:2685: Lank_3.87 anutpannamidaṃ sarvaṃ na ca bhāvā na santi ca /
S04bsu021_u:2687: Lank_3.88 anutpannasvabhāvāśca śūnyāḥ kena vadāhi me /
S04bsu021_u:2692: Lank_3.90 svapna keśoṇḍukaṃ māyā gandharvaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇikā /
S04bsu021_u:2695: anutpāde prasādhyante mama netrī na naśyati /
S04bsu021_u:2697: Lank_3.92 kathaṃ kena kutaḥ kutra saṃbhavo 'hetuko bhavet /
S04bsu021_u:2698: nāhetuko na hetubhyo yadā paśyanti saṃskṛtam /
S04bsu021_u:2701: atha bhāvasya nāmedaṃ nirarthaṃ vā bravīhi me //
S04bsu021_u:2702: Lank_3.94 na cābhāvo hyanutpādo na ca pratyayavīkṣaṇam /
S04bsu021_u:2703: na ca bhāvasya nāmedaṃ na ca nāma nirarthakam //
S04bsu021_u:2704: Lank_3.95 yatra śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ tīrthyānāṃ ca agocaraḥ /
S04bsu021_u:2712: Lank_3.99 na bāhyabhāvaṃ nābhāvaṃ nāpi cittaparigrahaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:2715: Lank_3.100 evaṃ śūnyāsvabhāvādyān padān sarvān vibhāvayet /
S04bsu021_u:2716: na jātu śūnyayā śūnyā kiṃ tvanutpādaśūnyayā //
S04bsu021_u:2717: Lank_3.101 kalāpaḥ pratyayānāṃ ca pravartate nivartate /
S04bsu021_u:2718: kalāpācca pṛthagbhūtaṃ na jātaṃ na nirudhyate //
S04bsu021_u:2719: Lank_3.102 bhāvo na vidyate 'nyo 'nyaḥ kalāpācca pṛthak kvacit /
S04bsu021_u:2721: Lank_3.103 asanna jāyate bhāvo nāsanna sadasatkvacit /
S04bsu021_u:2727: Lank_3.106 yasya janyo bhavedbhāvaḥ saṃkalāyāḥ pṛthak kvacit /
S04bsu021_u:2729: Lank_3.107 pradīpo dravyajātīnāṃ vyañjakaḥ saṃkalā bhavet /
S04bsu021_u:2735: Lank_3.110 yadā sarvamimaṃ lokaṃ saṃkalāmeva paśyati /
S04bsu021_u:2739: Lank_3.112 parato yasya vai bhāvaḥ pratyayairjāyate kvacit /
S04bsu021_u:2740: na saṃkalāmātramevedaṃ na te yuktyāgame sthitāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:2741: Lank_3.113 yadi janyo na bhāvo 'sti syādbuddhiḥ kasya pratyayāt /
S04bsu021_u:2744: kalāpo 'yaṃ na dharmo 'sti ato vai niḥsvabhāvatā //
S04bsu021_u:2746: na tu śāstrasya bhedo 'sti doṣabhedāttu bhidyate //
S04bsu021_u:2748: indriyāṇāṃ balaṃ jñātvā nayaṃ deśemi prāṇinām //
S04bsu021_u:2749: Lank_3.117 na kleśendriyabhedena śāsanaṃ bhidyate mama /
S04bsu021_u:2751: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - anityatā anityateti bhagavan sarvatīrthakarairvikalpyate /
S04bsu021_u:2752: tvayā ca sarvadeśanāpāṭhe deśyate - anityā bata saṃskārā utpādavyayadharmiṇa iti /
S04bsu021_u:2755: bhagavānāha - aṣṭaprakārā hi mahāmate sarvatīrthakarairanityatā kalpyate, na tu mayā /
S04bsu021_u:2761: nairantaryaprabandhena svarasabhaṅgabhedaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ kṣīradadhipariṇāmavikārāntaravadadṛṣṭanaṣṭā sarvabhāveṣu pravartate na nityateti /
S04bsu021_u:2766: tatra anutpādānityatā nāma yaduta nityamanityaṃ sadasatorapravṛttiḥ sarvadharmāṇāmadarśanaṃ paramāṇupravicayādadarśanam /
S04bsu021_u:2768: etaddhi mahāmate anutpādānityatāyā lakṣaṇaṃ yasyānavabodhātsarvatīrthakarā utpādānityatāvāde prapatanti //
S04bsu021_u:2769: punaraparaṃ mahāmate yasya bhāvo nityatā, tasya svamativikalpenaiva nityatā nānityatā bhāvaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:2775: na ca kāryakāraṇayorviśeṣo 'sti iyamanityatā idaṃ kāryamiti /
S04bsu021_u:2779: na ca kāraṇaṃ visadṛśaṃ kāryaṃ janayati /

S04bsu021_u:3095: śarīravatāṃ hi mahāmate nāśo bhavati nāśarīravatām /

S04bsu021_u:3098: evameva mahāmate tathāgatāḥ sattvaduḥkhairniṣpīḍyamānā dharmadhātvīśvarapraṇidhānasukhaṃ na vijahati mahāmate mahākaruṇopetatvāt,
S04bsu021_u:3100: tadyathā mahāmate gaṅgāyāṃ nadyāṃ vālukāḥ pravāhānukūlāḥ pravahanti nānudake,
S04bsu021_u:3101: evameva mahāmate tathāgatānāṃ sarvabuddhadharmadeśanā nirvāṇapravāhānukūlā saṃvartate /
S04bsu021_u:3105: na ca mahāmate saṃsārasya pūrvā koṭiḥ prajñāyate /

S04bsu021_u:3108: mahāmatirāha - tadyadi bhagavan pūrvā koṭirna prajñāyate sattvānāṃ saṃsaratām,
S04bsu021_u:3113: na cātra vikalpādanyatkiṃcitsattvāntaramasti, adhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā parīkṣyamāṇaṃ buddhyā /
S04bsu021_u:3117: Lank_6.7 gaṅgāyāṃ vālukāsamān ye paśyanti vināyakān /
S04bsu021_u:3121: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - deśayatu bhagavān,
S04bsu021_u:3122: deśayatu me sugatastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgaṃ bhedalakṣaṇaṃ caiṣām /
S04bsu021_u:3124: bhagavānāha - tena hi mahāmate śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru /
S04bsu021_u:3126: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
S04bsu021_u:3127: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat - sarvadharmāḥ sarvadharmā iti mahāmate yaduta kuśalākuśalāḥ saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtā laukikalokottarāḥ sāvadyānavadyāḥ sāsravānāsravā upāttānupāttāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:3129: samādhisukhasamāpattayo mahāmate dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārabhāvena āryāṇāṃ kuśalānāsravā ityucyante /
S04bsu021_u:3132: yaduta tathāgatagarbha ālayavijñānasaṃśabdito mano manovijñānaṃ ca pañca ca vijñānakāyāstīrthyānuvarṇitāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:3133: tatra mahāmate pañca vijñānakāyā manovijñānasahitā kuśalākuśalakṣaṇaparaṃparābhedabhinnāḥ saṃtatiprabandhanābhinnaśarīrāḥ pravartamānāḥ pravartante /
S04bsu021_u:3136: saṃsthānākṛtiviśeṣagrāhakaṃ manovijñānaṃ pañcabhirvijñānakāyaiḥ saha saṃprayuktaṃ pravartate kṣaṇakālānavasthāyi /
S04bsu021_u:3138: kṣaṇikaṃ punarmahāmate ālayavijñānaṃ tathāgatagarbhasaṃśabditaṃ manaḥsahitaṃ pravṛttivijñānavāsanābhiḥ kṣaṇikamanāsravavāsanābhirakṣaṇikam /
S04bsu021_u:3139: na ca bālapṛthagjanā avabudhyante kṣaṇikavādābhiniviṣṭā kṣaṇikākṣaṇikatāmimāṃ sarvadharmāṇām /
S04bsu021_u:3141: [Vaidya_96] asaṃsāriṇo mahāmate pañca vijñānakāyā ananubhūtasukhaduḥkhā anirvāṇahetavaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:3145: punaraparaṃ mahāmate samadhāraṇaṃ kalpasthitāḥ suvarṇavajrajinadhātuprāptiviśeṣā abhaṅginaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:3146: yadi punarmahāmate abhisamayaprāptiḥ kṣaṇikā syāt, anāryatvamāryāṇāṃ syāt /
S04bsu021_u:3148: suvarṇaṃ vajraṃ ca mahāmate samadhāraṇaṃ kalpasthitā api tulyamānā na hīyante na vardhante /
S04bsu021_u:3149: tatkathaṃ bālaiḥ kṣaṇikārthe vikalpyate ādhyātmikabāhyānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāmasaṃdhābhāṣyakuśalaiḥ?
S04bsu021_u:3150: punarapi mahāmatirāha - yatpunaretaduktaṃ bhagavatā - ṣaṭpāramitāṃ paripūrya buddhatvamavāpyata iti /
S04bsu021_u:3159: tatra lokottarābhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhā nirvāṇagrāhapatitāśayā dānādiṣu prayujyante yathaiva bālā ātmasukhanirvāṇābhilāṣiṇaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:3161: yattatraivālambane vikalpasyāpravṛttiṃ śīlayanti, tacchīlaṃ pāramitā ca sā /
S04bsu021_u:3162: yā tasyaiva vikalpasyāpravṛttikṣamaṇatā grāhyagrāhakaparijñayā, sā kṣāntipāramitā /
S04bsu021_u:3163: yena vīryeṇa pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ ghaṭate yogānukūladarśanādvikalpasya vyāvṛtteḥ, sā vīryapāramitā /
S04bsu021_u:3165: tatra prajñāpāramitā yadā svacittavikalpābhāvādābuddhipravicayātprativicinvan antadvaye na patati āśrayaparāvṛttipūrvakarmavināśataḥ,
S04bsu021_u:3170: Lank_6.9 śūnyamanityaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ bālāḥ kalpenti saṃskṛtam /

S04bsu021_u:3176: Lank_6.12 sā vidyā kāraṇaṃ teṣāṃ cittānāṃ saṃpravartikam /
S04bsu021_u:3179: rūpaṃ na tiṣṭhate kāle kimālambya pravartsyate //
S04bsu021_u:3182: Lank_6.15 yogināṃ hi samāpattiḥ suvarṇaṃ jinadhātavaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:3186: Lank_6.17 gandharvapuramāyādyā rūpā vai kṣaṇikā na kim /
S04bsu021_u:3193: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat - arhantaḥ punarbhagavatā vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu021_u:3195: yasyāṃ ca rātrau tathāgato 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddho yasyāṃ ca rātrau parinirvṛtaḥ,
S04bsu021_u:3196: etasminnantare bhagavatā ekamapyakṣaraṃ nodāhṛtaṃ na pravyāhṛtam /
S04bsu021_u:3197: sadā samāhitāśca tathāgatā na vitarkayanti na vyavacārayanti /
S04bsu021_u:3199: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ ca vijñānānāṃ kṣaṇaparaṃparābhedalakṣaṇaṃ nirdiśyate?
S04bsu021_u:3204: cañcāmāṇavikā sundarikā pravrājikā yathā dhautapātrādīni ca bhagavan karmāvaraṇāni dṛśyante /
S04bsu021_u:3206: bhagavānāha - tena hi mahāmate śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru /
S04bsu021_u:3208: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
S04bsu021_u:3209: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat - nirupadhiśeṣaṃ nirvāṇadhātuṃ saṃdhāya bodhisattvacaryāṃ ca caritavatāṃ protsāhanārtham /
S04bsu021_u:3210: santi hi mahāmate bodhisattvacaryācāriṇaḥ iha anyeṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu /
S04bsu021_u:3211: yeṣāṃ śrāvakayānanirvāṇābhilāṣasteṣāṃ śrāvakayānarucivyāvartanārthaṃ mahāyānagatiprotsāhanārthaṃ ca tannirmitaśrāvakānnirmāṇakāyairvyākaroti,
S04bsu021_u:3214: na hi mahāmate śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ kleśāvaraṇaprahāṇaviśeṣo vimuktyekarasatayā /
S04bsu021_u:3219: pūrvadharmasthititāṃ saṃdhāya apūrvacaramasya cābhāvātpūrvaprahiṇairevākṣaraistathāgato na vitarkya na vicārya dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu021_u:3223: sapta mahāmate manomanovijñānacakṣurvijñānādayaḥ kṣaṇikāḥ vāsanāhetutvātkuśalānāsravapakṣarahitāḥ na saṃsāriṇaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:3226: nirmitanairmāṇikānāṃ mahāmate tathāgatānāṃ vajrapāṇiḥ pārśvānugato na maulānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām /
S04bsu021_u:3227: maulo hi mahāmate tathāgataḥ sarvapramāṇendriyavinivṛttaḥ sarvabālaśrāvakapratyekabuddhatīrthyānām /
S04bsu021_u:3231: na teṣu tathāgato na cānyatra tebhyastathāgataḥ /
S04bsu021_u:3235: punaraparaṃ mahāmate ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānakāyānāṃ nirodhāducchedadṛṣṭimāśrayanti [Vaidya_99] bālapṛthagjanāḥ,
S04bsu021_u:3241: Lank_7.1 trīṇi yānānyayānaṃ ca buddhānāṃ nāsti nirvṛtiḥ /
S04bsu021_u:3246: yānti tenaiva nānyena atasteṣāṃ na nirvṛtiḥ //
S04bsu021_u:3256: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantaṃ gāthābhiḥ paripṛcchaya punarapyadhyeṣate sma - deśayatu me bhagavāṃstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho māṃsabhakṣaṇe guṇadoṣam,
S04bsu021_u:3257: yena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anāgatapratyutpannakāle sattvānāṃ kravyādasattvagativāsanāvāsitānāṃ māṃsabhojagṛddhāṇāṃ rasatṛṣṇāprahāṇāya dharmaṃ deśayāma,
S04bsu021_u:3258: yathā ca te kravyādabhojinaḥ sattvā virāgya rasatṛṣṇāṃ dharmarasāhārakāṅkṣayā sarvasattvaikaputrakapremānugatāḥ parasparaṃ mahāmaitrīṃ pratilabheran /
S04bsu021_u:3260: śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmyā vā viśramya anuttarāṃ tāthāgatīṃ bhūmimupasarpayeyuḥ /
S04bsu021_u:3262: svayaṃ ca na bhakṣyate, prāgeva kṛpaikarase samyaksaṃbuddhe praṇīte lokanāthe /
S04bsu021_u:3263: tava śāsane māṃsaṃ svayaṃ ca bhakṣyate, bhakṣyamāṇaṃ ca na nivāryate /
S04bsu021_u:3264: tatsādhu bhagavān sarvalokānukampakaḥ sarvasattvaiputrakasamadarśī mahākāruṇiko 'nukampāmupādāya māṃsabhakṣaṇe guṇadeṣān deśayatu me,
S04bsu021_u:3265: yathā ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvāstathatvāya sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayema /
S04bsu021_u:3266: bhagavānāha - tena hi mahāmate śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru /
S04bsu021_u:3268: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt //
S04bsu021_u:3269: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat - aparimitairmahāmate kāraṇairmāṃsaṃ sarvamabhakṣyaṃ kṛpātmano bodhisattvasya /
S04bsu021_u:3271_0: iha mahāmate anena dīrgheṇādhvanā saṃsaratāṃ prāṇināṃ nāstyasau kaścitsattvaḥ sulabharūpo
S04bsu021_u:3271_1: yo na mātābhūtpitā vā bhrātā vā bhaginī vā putro vā duhitā vā anyatarānyataro vā
S04bsu021_u:3273: rākṣasasyāpi mahāmate tathāgatānāmimāṃ dharmasudharmatāmupaśrutya upagatarakṣabhāvāḥ kṛpālavā bhavanti māṃsabhakṣaṇavinivṛttāḥ,
S04bsu021_u:3275: evaṃ tāvanmahāmate teṣu teṣu jātiparivarteṣu sarvasattvāḥ svajanabandhubhāvasaṃjñāḥ sarvasattvaikaputrakasaṃjñābhāvanārthaṃ māṃsaṃ sarvamabhakṣyam /
S04bsu021_u:3277: vyabhicārādapi mahāmate māṃsaṃ sarvamabhakṣyaṃ cāritravato bodhisattvasya /
S04bsu021_u:3279: tāni ca mahāmate vīthyantareṣvaurabhrikā bhakṣyāṇīti kṛtvā mūlyahetorvikrīyante yataḥ,
S04bsu021_u:3282: udvejanakaratvādapi mahāmate bhūtānāṃ maitrīmicchato yogino māṃsaṃ sarvamabhakṣyaṃ bodhisattvasya /
S04bsu021_u:3283: [Vaidya_101] tadyathāpi mahāmate ḍombacāṇḍālakaivartādīn piśitāśinaḥ sattvān dūrata eva dṛṣṭvā śvānaḥ prabhayanti bhayena,
S04bsu021_u:3285: evameva mahāmate anye 'pi khabhūjalasaṃniśritān sūkṣmajantavo ye māṃsāśino darśanāddūrādeva paṭunā ghrāṇenāghrāya gandhaṃ rākṣasasyeva mānuṣā drutamapasarpanti,
S04bsu021_u:3287: tasmādapi ca mahāmate udvejanakaratvānmahāmaitrīvihāriṇo yogino māṃsamabhakṣyaṃ bodhisattvasya anāryajanajuṣṭaṃ durgandham /
S04bsu021_u:3289: ṛṣibhojanāhāro hi mahāmate āryajano na māṃsarudhirāhāraḥ,
S04bsu021_u:3291: bahujanacittānurakṣaṇatayāpi apavādaparihāraṃ cecchataḥ śāsanasya mahāmate māṃsamabhakṣyaṃ kṛpātmano bodhisattvasya /
S04bsu021_u:3294: yannāmaite pūrvarṣibhojanānyapāsya kravyādā ivāmiṣāhārāḥ paripūrṇakukṣayaḥ khabhūmijalasaṃniśritān sūkṣmāṃstrāsayanto jantūn samutrāsayanta imaṃ lokaṃ samantataḥ paryaṭanti /
S04bsu021_u:3299: tasmādbahujanacittānurakṣaṇatayāpi apavādaparihāraṃ cecchataḥ śāsanasya mahāmate māṃsaṃṃ sarvamabhakṣyaṃ kṛpātmano bodhisattvasya //
S04bsu021_u:3301: mṛtasyāpi hi mahāmate manuṣyasya māṃse dahyamāne tadanyaprāṇimāṃse ca, na kaścidgandhaviśeṣaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:3303: ato 'pi mahāmate śucikāmasya yoginaḥ sarvaṃ māṃsamabhakṣyaṃ bodhisattvasya //
S04bsu021_u:3304_0: śmaśānikānāṃ ca mahāmate araṇyavanaprasthānyamanuṣyāvacarāṇi prāntāni śayanāsanānyadhyāvasatāṃ
S04bsu021_u:3304_1: yogināṃ yogācārāṇāṃ maitrīvihāriṇāṃ vidyādharāṇāṃ vidyāṃ sādhayitukāmānāṃ vidyāsādhanamokṣavighnakaratvānmahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ
S04bsu021_u:3304_2: kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca sarvayogasādhanāntarāyakaramityapi samanupaśyatāṃ mahāmate
S04bsu021_u:3306: devatā api cainaṃ parivarjayantīti kṛtvā mahāmate kṛpātmanaḥ sarvaṃ māṃsamabhakṣyaṃ bodhisattvasya /
S04bsu021_u:3308: ityapi kṛtvā mahāmate kṛpātmanaḥ sarvaṃ māṃsamabhakṣyaṃ bodhisattvasya /
S04bsu021_u:3315: āhāre ca mātrāṃ na jānāti nāpyaśitapītakhāditākhāditasya samyagrasapariṇāmapuṣṭyādi samāsādayati,
S04bsu021_u:3321: na ca mahāmate anāgate 'dhvani ekeṣāṃ mohapuruṣāṇāṃ vividhavinayavikalpavādināṃ kravyādakulavāsitāvāsitānāṃ rasatṛṣṇāvyavasitānāmidaṃ praṇītaṃ bhojanaṃ pratibhāṣyate /
S04bsu021_u:3324: sa māṃsabhojanāhārātiprasaṅgena pratisevamāno rasatṛṣṇādhyavasānaparamatayā māṃsāni mānuṣyāṇyapi bhakṣitavān /
S04bsu021_u:3325: tannidānaṃ ca mitrāmātyajñātibandhuvargeṇāpi parityaktaḥ, prāgeva paurajānapadaiḥ /
S04bsu021_u:3330: yasmādrājā anaparādhibhūtānukampakaḥ śibī duḥkhena mahatā lambhitaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:3331: tadevamanekajanmābhyastamapi mahāmate devendrabhūtasya śakrasyāpi sataḥ svaparadoṣāvahanamabhūt,
S04bsu021_u:3333_0: anyeṣāṃ ca mahāmate narendrabhūtānāṃ satāmaśvenāpahṛtānāmaṭavyāṃ paryaṭamānānāṃ siṃhyā
S04bsu021_u:3333_1: saha maithunaṃ gatavatāṃ jīvitabhayādapatyāni cotpāditavantaḥ siṃhasaṃvāsānvayātkalmāṣapādaprabhṛtayo
S04bsu021_u:3333_2: nṛpaputrāḥ pūrvajanmamāṃsādadoṣavāsanatayā manuṣyendrabhūtā api santo māṃsādā abhūvan /
S04bsu021_u:3334: ihaiva ca mahāmate janmani saptakuṭīrake 'pi grāme pracuramāṃsalaulyādatiprasaṅgena niṣevamānā mānuṣamāṃsādā ghorā ḍākā vā ḍākinyaśca saṃjāyante /
S04bsu021_u:3336: yatra vinipatitānāṃ duḥkhena mānuṣyayonirapi samāpadyate, prāgave nirvṛtiḥ /
S04bsu021_u:3337: ityevamādayo mahāmate māṃsādadoṣāḥ prāgeva niṣevamānānāṃ samupajāyante,
S04bsu021_u:3339: na ca mahāmate bālapṛthagjanā [Vaidya_103] etāṃścānyāṃśca guṇadoṣānavabudhyante /
S04bsu021_u:3340: evamādiguṇadoṣadarśanānmahāmate māṃsaṃ sarvamabhakṣyaṃ kṛpātmano bodhisattvasyeti vadāmi //
S04bsu021_u:3341: yadi ca mahāmate māṃsaṃ na kathaṃcana kecana bhakṣayeyuḥ, na tannidānaṃ ghāteran /
S04bsu021_u:3342: mūlyahetorhi mahāmate prāyaḥ prāṇino niraparādhino vadhyante svalpādanyahetoḥ /
S04bsu021_u:3343: kaṣṭaṃ mahāmate rasatṛṣṇāyāmatisevatāṃ māṃsāni mānuṣānyapi mānuṣairbhakṣyante,
S04bsu021_u:3345: prāyo mahāmate māṃsarasatṛṣṇārtairidaṃ tathā tathā jālayantramāviddhaṃ mohapuruṣaiḥ,
S04bsu021_u:3347: na caiṣāṃ mahāmate kiṃkanīkṛtarūkṣacetasāṃ rākṣasānāmiva gataghṛṇānāṃ kadācidapi prāṇiṣu prāṇisaṃjñayā ghātayatāṃ bhakṣayatāṃ na ghṛṇotpadyate //
S04bsu021_u:3348: na ca mahāmate akṛtakamakāritamasaṃkalpitaṃ nāma māṃsaṃ kalpyamasti yadupādāya anujānīyāṃ śrāvakebhyaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:3349_0: bhaviṣyanti tu punarmahāmate anāgate 'dhvani mamaiva śāsane pravrajitvā śākyaputrīyatvaṃ
S04bsu021_u:3353: praṇītabhojaneṣu coktam, svayaṃ ca kila tathāgatena paribhuktamiti /
S04bsu021_u:3354: na ca mahāmate kutracitsūtre pratisevitavyamityanujñātam, praṇītabhojaneṣu vā deśitaṃ kalpyamiti //
S04bsu021_u:3355: yadi tu mahāmate anujñātukāmatā me syāt,
S04bsu021_u:3356: kalpyaṃ vā me śrāvakāṇāṃ pratisevituṃ syāt,
S04bsu021_u:3357_0: nāhaṃ maitrīvihāriṇāṃ yogināṃ yogācārāṇāṃ śmaśānikānāṃ mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
S04bsu021_u:3358_0: asmin mahāmate dharmakāmānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca sarvayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ
S04bsu021_u:3358_1: śmaśānikānāṃ maitrīvihāriṇāmāraṇyakānāṃ yogināṃ yogācārāṇāṃ sarvayogasādhanāya sarvasattvaikaputrakasaṃjñābhāvanārthaṃ
S04bsu021_u:3359: tatra tatra deśanāpāṭhe śikṣāpadānāmanupūrvībandhaṃ niḥśreṇīpadavinyāsayogena trikoṭiṃ baddhvā na taduddiśya kṛtāni pratiṣiddhāni /

S04bsu021_u:3365: tadanyeṣāṃ mahāmate mohapuruṣāṇāṃ svakarmadoṣāvaraṇāvṛtānāṃ dīrgharātramanarthāyāhitāya saṃvartakaṃ bhaviṣyati /

S04bsu021_u:3370: so 'haṃ mahāmate sarvasattvaikaputrakasaṃjñī san kathamiva svaputramāṃsamanujñāsyāmi paribhoktuṃ śrāvakebhyaḥ,
