S04bsu021_u:3838: mahāmate nibodha tvaṃ yo netrīṃ dhārayiṣyati //
S04bsu021_u:3845: Lank_10.168 pratyayotpādite hyarthe nāstyastīti na vidyate /
S04bsu021_u:3846: pratyayāntargataṃ bhāvaṃ ye kalpentyasti nāsti ca /
S04bsu021_u:3858: Lank_10.174 advayā tathatā śūnyā bhūtakoṣṭiśca dharmatā /
S04bsu021_u:3860: Lank_10.175 vākcittagocaraṃ mithyā satyaṃ prajñā vikalpitā /
S04bsu021_u:3862: Lank_10.176 asti nāsti ca dvāvantau yāvaccittasya gocaraḥ /
S04bsu021_u:3866: Lank_10.178 bālānāṃ na tathā khyāti yathā khyāti manīṣiṇām /
S04bsu021_u:3868: Lank_10.179 hārakūṭaṃ yathā bālaiḥ suvarṇaṃ parikalpyate /
S04bsu021_u:3870: Lank_10.180 abhūtvā yasya cotpādo bhūtvā cāpi vinaśyati /
S04bsu021_u:3871: pratyayaiḥ sadasaccāpi na te me śāsane sthitāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:3874: Lank_10.182 atīto vidyate bhāvo vidyate ca anāgataḥ /
S04bsu021_u:3877: antarābhavasaṃgrāhaṃ ye kalpanti na te budhāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:3878: Lank_10.184 na pratītyasamutpannaṃ lokaṃ varṇanti vai jināḥ /
S04bsu021_u:3881: saṃketācca pṛthagbhūto na jāto na nirudhyate //
S04bsu021_u:3882: Lank_10.186 darpaṇe udake netre bhāṇḍeṣu ca maṇīṣu ca /
S04bsu021_u:3883: bimbaṃ hi dṛśyate teṣu na ca bimbo 'sti kutracit //
S04bsu021_u:3884: Lank_10.187 bhāvābhāsaṃ tathā cittaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇā yathā nabhe /
S04bsu021_u:3886: Lank_10.188 na me yānaṃ mahāyānaṃ na ghoṣo na ca akṣarāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:3887: na satyā na vimokṣā vai na nirābhāsagocaram //
S04bsu021_u:3888: Lank_10.189 kiṃ tu yānaṃ mahāyānaṃ samādhivaśavartitā /
S04bsu021_u:3890: Lank_10.190 ekatvena pṛthaktvena bhāvo vai pratyaye na tu /
S04bsu021_u:3891: janma samāsamevoktaṃ nirodho nāśa eva hi //
S04bsu021_u:3894: Lank_10.192 tathatā śūnyatā koṭī nirvāṇaṃ dharmadhātuvat /
S04bsu021_u:3897: granthato na tu arthena na te nairātmyamāśritāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:3898: Lank_10.194 na tīrthikairna buddhaiśca na mayā na ca kenacit /
S04bsu021_u:3902: Lank_10.196 yasya notpadyate kiṃcinna kiṃcittaṃ nirudhyate /
S04bsu021_u:3904: Lank_10.197 dṛśyate śaśaviṣāṇākhyaṃ vikalpo vidyate nṛṇām /
S04bsu021_u:3905: ye tu kalpenti te bhrāntā mṛgatṛṣṇāṃ yathā mṛgāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:3907: nirhetukaṃ vikalpaṃ hi vikalpo 'pi na yujyate //
S04bsu021_u:3908: Lank_10.199 ajale ca jalagrāho mṛgatṛṣṇā yathā nabhe /
S04bsu021_u:3912: Lank_10.201 gāmbhīryodāryavaipulyaṃ jñānaṃ kṣetrān vibhūti ca /
S04bsu021_u:3918: Lank_10.204 svabhāvakalpitaṃ bāhyaṃ paratantraṃ ca dehinām /
S04bsu021_u:3920: Lank_10.205 daśamī tu bhavetprathamī prathamī cāṣṭamī bhavet /
S04bsu021_u:3921: navamī saptamī cāpi saptamī cāṣṭamī bhavet //
S04bsu021_u:3922: Lank_10.206 dvitīyā tu tṛtīyā syāccaturthī pañcamī bhavet /
S04bsu021_u:3923: tṛtīyā tu bhavetṣaṣṭhī nirābhāse kramaḥ kutaḥ //
S04bsu021_u:3924: Lank_10.207 nirābhāso hi bhāvānāmabhāvo nāsti yoginām /
S04bsu021_u:3926: Lank_10.208 kathaṃ hyabhāvo bhāvānāṃ kurute samatāṃ katham /
S04bsu021_u:3927: yadā cittaṃ na jānāti bāhyamadhyātmikaṃ calam /
S04bsu021_u:3930: bālaiḥ kīla yathā kīlaṃ pralobhya vinivartate //
S04bsu021_u:3932: hetuṃ dadāti cittasya vijñānaṃ ca samāśritam //
S04bsu021_u:3934: labhyante yena vai svapne abhijñāśca caturvidhāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:3935: Lank_10.212 svapne ca labhyate yacca yacca buddhaprasādataḥ /
S04bsu021_u:3938: bālā yadā na budhyante utpādaṃ deśayettadā //
S04bsu021_u:3939: Lank_10.214 yāvadvākyaṃ vikalpeti bhāvaṃ vai lakṣaṇānvitam /
S04bsu021_u:3941: Lank_10.215 utpādo varṇyate kasmātkasmāddṛśyaṃ na varṇyate /
S04bsu021_u:3942: adṛśyaṃ dṛśyamānaṃ hi kasya kiṃ varṇyate kutaḥ //
S04bsu021_u:3943: Lank_10.216 svacchaṃ cittaṃ svabhāvena manaḥ kaluṣakārakam /
S04bsu021_u:3945: Lank_10.217 ālayo muñcate kāyaṃ manaḥ prārthayate gatim /
S04bsu021_u:3947: Lank_10.218 madīyaṃ dṛśyate cittaṃ bāhyamarthaṃ na vidyate /
S04bsu021_u:3949: Lank_10.219 dhyāyināṃ viṣayaḥ karma buddhamāhātmyameva ca /
S04bsu021_u:3951: Lank_10.220 anāgatamatītaṃ ca nirvāṇaṃ pudgalaṃ vacaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:3956: gūḍhabījaṃ bhavedbodhau svapne vai sidhyate tu yaḥ //
S04bsu021_u:3957: Lank_10.223 kutra keṣāṃ kathaṃ kasmātkimarthaṃ ca vadāhi me /
S04bsu021_u:3961: Lank_10.225 vikalpo mano nāma vijñānaiḥ pañcabhiḥ saha /
S04bsu021_u:3963: Lank_10.226 yadā cittaṃ manaścāpi vijñānaṃ na pravartate /
S04bsu021_u:3964: tadā manomayaṃ kāyaṃ labhate buddhabhūmi ca //
S04bsu021_u:3965: Lank_10.227 pratyayā dhātavaḥ skandhā dharmāṇāṃ ca svalakṣaṇam /
S04bsu021_u:3967: Lank_10.228 māyāsvapnopamaṃ lokaṃ dṛṣṭvā tattvaṃ samāśrayet /
S04bsu021_u:3973: Lank_10.231 naiḥsvabhāvyaṃ ca bhāvaṃ ca śūnyā vai nityānityatā /
S04bsu021_u:3977: Lank_10.233 saṃsārabījaṃ vijñānaṃ sati dṛśye pravartate /
S04bsu021_u:3981: Lank_10.235 adhyātmabāhyaṃ dvividhaṃ dharmāśca pratyayāni ca /
S04bsu021_u:3983: Lank_10.236 na vāsanairbhidyate cittaṃ na cittaṃ vāsanaiḥ saha /
S04bsu021_u:3987: Lank_10.238 yathā na bhāvo nābhāvo gaganaṃ kathyate mayā /
S04bsu021_u:4001: Lank_10.245 triyānamekayānaṃ ca ayānaṃ ca vadāmyaham /
S04bsu021_u:4003: Lank_10.246 utpattirdvividhā mahyaṃ lakṣaṇādhigamau ca yā /
S04bsu021_u:4009: Lank_10.249 nityaṃ ca śāśvataṃ tattvaṃ gotraṃ vastusvabhāvakam /
S04bsu021_u:4011: Lank_10.250 yadyadvastu na śuddhiḥ syātsaṃkleśo nāpi kasyacit /
S04bsu021_u:4017: bahirdhā dṛśyate nṝṇāṃ na hi cittasya dharmatā //
S04bsu021_u:4018: Lank_10.253 cittasya dharmatā śuddhā na cittaṃ bhrāntisaṃbhavam /
S04bsu021_u:4019: bhrāntiśca dauṣṭhulyamayī tena cittaṃ na dṛśyate //
S04bsu021_u:4020: Lank_10.254 bhrāntimātraṃ bhavettattvaṃ tattvaṃ nānyatra vidyate /
S04bsu021_u:4021: na saṃskāre na cānyatra kiṃ tu saṃskāradarśanāt //
S04bsu021_u:4023: vidhūtaṃ hi bhavettena svacittaṃ paśyato jagat //
S04bsu021_u:4024: Lank_10.256 cittamātraṃ samāruhya bāhyamarthaṃ na kalpayet /
S04bsu021_u:4033: dve satye buddhabhūmiśca prajñā yatra pravartate //
S04bsu021_u:4038: Lank_10.263 grāhyaṃ grāho grahītā ca nāsti nāma hyavastukam /
S04bsu021_u:4039: nirhetukaṃ vikalpaṃ ye manyanti hi na te budhāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:4040: Lank_10.264 arthe nāma hyasaṃbhūtamartho nāmni tathaiva ca /
S04bsu021_u:4050: Lank_10.269 ālayaṃ hi samāśritya mano vai saṃpravartate /
S04bsu021_u:4054: Lank_10.271 manaśca lakṣaṇaṃ vastu nityānitye na manyate /
S04bsu021_u:4055: utpādaṃ cāpyanutpādaṃ yogī yoge na manyate //
S04bsu021_u:4056: Lank_10.272 arthadvayaṃ na kalpenti vijñānaṃ hyālayodbhavam /
S04bsu021_u:4058: Lank_10.273 na vaktā na ca vācyo 'sti na śūnyaṃ cittadarśanāt /
S04bsu021_u:4060: Lank_10.274 pratyayāgamanaṃ nāsti indriyāṇi na kecana /
S04bsu021_u:4061: na dhātavo na ca skandhā na rāgo na ca saṃskṛtam //
S04bsu021_u:4062: Lank_10.275 karmaṇo 'gniṃ na vai pūrvaṃ na kṛtaṃ na ca saṃskṛtam /
S04bsu021_u:4063: na koṭi na ca vai śaktirna mokṣo na ca bandhanam //
S04bsu021_u:4064: Lank_10.276 avyākṛto na bhāvo 'sti dharmādharmaṃ na caiva hi /
S04bsu021_u:4065: na kālaṃ na ca nirvāṇaṃ dharmatāpi na vidyate //
S04bsu021_u:4066: Lank_10.277 na ca buddho na satyāni na phalaṃ na ca hetavaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4067: viparyayo na nirvāṇaṃ vibhavo nāsti saṃbhavaḥ //
S04bsu021_u:4068: Lank_10.278 dvādaśāṅgaṃ na caivāsti antānantaṃ na caiva hi /
S04bsu021_u:4070: Lank_10.279 kleśāḥ karmapathā dehaḥ kartāraśca phalaṃ ca vai /
S04bsu021_u:4074: Lank_10.281 skandhā na santi nirvāṇe na caivātmā na lakṣaṇam /
S04bsu021_u:4076: Lank_10.282 bhūdṛśyahetuko doṣo bahirdhā khyāyate nṛṇām /
S04bsu021_u:4077: cittaṃ hyadṛśyasaṃbhūtaṃ tena cittaṃ na dṛśyate //
S04bsu021_u:4079: cittaṃ na bhāvo nābhāvo vāsane na virājate //
S04bsu021_u:4080: Lank_10.284 malo vai khyāyate śukle na śukle khyāyate malaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4081: ghane hi gaganaṃ yadvattathā cittaṃ na dṛśyate //
S04bsu021_u:4082: Lank_10.285 cittena cīyate karma jñānena ca vicīyate /
S04bsu021_u:4084: Lank_10.286 cittaṃ viṣayasaṃbaddhaṃ jñānaṃ tarke pravartate /
S04bsu021_u:4085: nirābhāse viśeṣe ca jñānaṃ vai saṃpravartate //
S04bsu021_u:4086: Lank_10.287 cittaṃ manaśca vijñānaṃ saṃjñā vai kalpavarjitā /
S04bsu021_u:4088: Lank_10.288 kṣānte kṣānte viśeṣe vai jñānaṃ tāthāgataṃ śubham /
S04bsu021_u:4091: kalpitaṃ gṛhyate bhrāntyā paratantraṃ na kalpyate //
S04bsu021_u:4092: Lank_10.290 cittaṃ hyabhūtasaṃbhūtaṃ na cittaṃ dṛśyate kvacit /
S04bsu021_u:4096: Lank_10.292 prajñā hi trividhā mahyamāryaṃ yena prabhāvitam /
S04bsu021_u:4097: cittaṃ hyadṛśyasaṃbhūtaṃ tena cittaṃ na dṛśyate //
S04bsu021_u:4099: lakṣaṇaṃ kalpate yena yaḥ svabhāvān vṛṇoti ca //
S04bsu021_u:4103: Lank_10.295 sato hi asataścāpi pratyayairyadi jāyate /
S04bsu021_u:4105: Lank_10.296 vividhāgatirhi nirvṛttā yathā māyā na sidhyati /
S04bsu021_u:4106: nimittaṃ hi tathā citraṃ kalpyamānaṃ na sidhyati //
S04bsu021_u:4109: Lank_10.298 ya eva kalpito bhāvaḥ paratantraṃ tadeva hi /
S04bsu021_u:4111: Lank_10.299 saṃvṛtiḥ paramārthaśca tṛtīyaṃ nāsti hetukam /
S04bsu021_u:4113: Lank_10.300 yathā hi yogināṃ vastu citramekaṃ virājate /
S04bsu021_u:4114: na hyasti citratā tatra tathā kalpitalakṣaṇam //
S04bsu021_u:4115: Lank_10.301 yathā hi taimiraiścitraṃ kalpyate rūpadarśanam /
S04bsu021_u:4116: timiraṃ na rūpaṃ nārūpaṃ paratantraṃ tathā budhaiḥ //
S04bsu021_u:4117: Lank_10.302 hemaṃ syāttu yathā śuddhaṃ jalaṃ kaluṣavarjitam /
S04bsu021_u:4121: Lank_10.304 bodhisattvo 'pi trividho buddhānāṃ nāsti lakṣaṇam /
S04bsu021_u:4122: citte citte tu sattvānāṃ buddhabimbaṃ vidṛśyate //
S04bsu021_u:4123: Lank_10.305 nāsti vai kalpito bhāvaḥ paratantraṃ ca vidyate /
S04bsu021_u:4131: Lank_10.309 parikalpitaṃ daśavidhaṃ paratantraṃ ca ṣaḍvidham /
S04bsu021_u:4133: Lank_10.310 pañca dharmā bhavettatvaṃ svabhāvā hi trayastathā /
S04bsu021_u:4137: Lank_10.312 bhūtālabdhātmakā hyete na lakṣyaṃ na ca lakṣaṇam /
S04bsu021_u:4138: sarve bhūtamayā bhūtā yadi rūpaṃ hi bhautikam //
S04bsu021_u:4139: Lank_10.313 asaṃbhūtā mahābhūtā nāsti bhūteṣu bhautikam /
S04bsu021_u:4143: Lank_10.315 icchantikaṃ pañcavidhaṃ gotrāḥ pañca tathā bhavet /
S04bsu021_u:4144: pañca yānānyayānaṃ ca nirvāṇaṃ ṣaḍvidhaṃ bhavet //
S04bsu021_u:4150: nairātmyaṃ ṣaḍvidhaṃ mahyaṃ jñeyaṃ cāpi caturvidham //
S04bsu021_u:4157: Lank_10.322 adhvatrayaṃ na caivāsti nityānityaṃ ca nāsti vai /
S04bsu021_u:4158: kriyā karma phalaṃ caiva svapnakāryaṃ tathā bhavet //
S04bsu021_u:4163: Lank_10.325 saṃkrāntiṃ saṃcaraṃ sattvaṃ deśanā nirvṛtistathā /
S04bsu021_u:4171: Lank_10.329 dhanadhānyaṃ suvarṇaṃ ca kṣetravastu vikalpyate /
S04bsu021_u:4173: Lank_10.330 talpaviddhe na svaptavyaṃ bhūmiścāpi na lepayet /
S04bsu021_u:4174: sauvarṇarājataṃ pātraṃ kāṃsaṃ tāmraṃ na kārayet //
S04bsu021_u:4175: Lank_10.331 kambalā nīlaraktāśca kāṣāyo gomayena ca /
S04bsu021_u:4177: Lank_10.332 śailīkaṃ mṛnmayaṃ lohaṃ śāṅkhaṃ vai sphaṭikamayam /
S04bsu021_u:4179: Lank_10.333 caturaṅgulaṃ bhavecchastraṃ kubjaṃ vai vastucchedanaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4181: Lank_10.334 krayavikrayo na kartavyo yoginā yogivāhinā /
S04bsu021_u:4183: Lank_10.335 guptendriyaṃ tathārthajñaṃ sūtrānte vinaye tathā /
S04bsu021_u:4184: gṛhasthairna ca saṃsṛṣṭaṃ yoginaṃ taṃ vadāmyaham //
S04bsu021_u:4185: Lank_10.336 śūnyāgāre śmaśāne vā vṛkṣamūle guhāsu vā /
S04bsu021_u:4191: Lank_10.339 gaṇe ca gaṇasaṃsṛṣṭe bhikṣuṇīṣu ca yadbhavet /
S04bsu021_u:4197: Lank_10.342 vihāre yatra vai dhūmaḥ pacyate vidhivatsadā /
S04bsu021_u:4198: uddiśya yatkṛtaṃ cāpi na tatkalpati yoginām //
S04bsu021_u:4205: Lank_10.346 svakalpakalpitaṃ lokaṃ citraṃ vai vāsanoditam /
S04bsu021_u:4209: Lank_10.348 kṛtabhaktapiṇḍo niścitamṛjuṃ saṃsthāpya vai tanum /
S04bsu021_u:4219: Lank_10.353 nimittāni ca citrāṇi tīrthyamārgaṃ nayanti te /
S04bsu021_u:4221: Lank_10.354 vidhūya sarvāṇyetāni nirābhāso yadā bhavet /
S04bsu021_u:4223: śiro hi tasya mārjanti nimittaṃ tathatānugāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:4228: Lank_10.357 bhāvagrāhaṃ na mokṣyante mā bhūducchedadarśanam /
S04bsu021_u:4232: Lank_10.359 cittamātraṃ na dṛśyanti dṛśyābhāvānna jāyate /
S04bsu021_u:4236: Lank_10.361 vikalpavṛttyā bhāvo na mokṣaṃ kalpenti bāliśāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4246: Lank_10.366 ajāḥ prasūtajanmā vai acyutāśca cyavanti ca /
S04bsu021_u:4248: Lank_10.367 ekadhā bahudhā bhūtvā varṣanti ca jvalanti vai /
S04bsu021_u:4249: citte cintamayā bhūtvā cittamātraṃ vadanti te //
S04bsu021_u:4250: Lank_10.368 citteṣu cittamātraṃ ca acittā cittasaṃbhavā /
S04bsu021_u:4256: Lank_10.371 māyopamaṃ samādhiṃ ca kāyaṃ cāpi manomayam /
S04bsu021_u:4257: daśa bhūmīśca vaśitāḥ parāvṛttā labhanti te //
S04bsu021_u:4260: Lank_10.373 nimittaṃ paratantraṃ hi yannāma tatra kalpitam /
S04bsu021_u:4262: Lank_10.374 buddhyā vivecyamānaṃ hi na tantraṃ nāpi kalpitam /
S04bsu021_u:4263: niṣpanno nāsti vai bhāvaḥ kathaṃ buddhyā prakalpyate //
S04bsu021_u:4266: Lank_10.376 parikalpite svabhāve ca svabhāvau dvau pratiṣṭhitau /
S04bsu021_u:4268: Lank_10.377 kalpitaṃ hi vicitrābhaṃ paratantre vikalpyate /
S04bsu021_u:4272: Lank_10.379 kṣetraṃ buddhāśca nirmāṇā ekaṃ yānaṃ trayaṃ tathā /
S04bsu021_u:4276: Lank_10.381 yathā hi kalpitaṃ bhāvaṃ khyāyate citradarśanam /
S04bsu021_u:4277: na hyasti citratā tatra buddhadharmaṃ tathā jagat //
S04bsu021_u:4278: Lank_10.382 dharmabuddho bhavedbuddhaḥ śeṣā vai tasya nirmitāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4281: vikalpā tathatā nānyā na nimittā vikalpanā //
S04bsu021_u:4284: Lank_10.385 nīle rakte 'tha lavaṇe śaṅkhe kṣīre ca śārkare /
S04bsu021_u:4286: Lank_10.386 na cānye na ca nānanye taraṃgā hyudadhāviva /
S04bsu021_u:4287: vijñānāni tathā sapta cittena saha saṃyutā //
S04bsu021_u:4289: ālayaṃ hi tathā citraṃ vijñānākhyaṃ pravartate //
S04bsu021_u:4290: Lank_10.388 cittaṃ manaśca vijñānaṃ lakṣaṇārthaṃ prakalpyate /
S04bsu021_u:4291: abhinnalakṣaṇānyaṣṭau na ca lakṣyaṃ na lakṣaṇam //
S04bsu021_u:4292: Lank_10.389 udadheśca taraṃgāṇāṃ yathā nāsti viśeṣaṇam /
S04bsu021_u:4293: vijñānānāṃ tathā citte pariṇāmo na labhyate //
S04bsu021_u:4294: Lank_10.390 cittena cīyate karma manasā ca vicīyate /
S04bsu021_u:4296: Lank_10.391 nīlaraktaprakāra hi vijñānaṃ khyāyate nṛṇām /
S04bsu021_u:4298: Lank_10.392 nīlaraktaprakāraṃ hi taraṃgeṣu na vidyate /
S04bsu021_u:4299: vṛttiśca varṇyate citte lakṣaṇārthaṃ hi bāliśāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:4300: Lank_10.393 na tasya vidyate vṛttiḥ svacittaṃ grāhyavarjitam /
S04bsu021_u:4301: grāhye sati hi vai grāhastaraṃgaiḥ saha sādhyate //
S04bsu021_u:4305: ālayasya tathā vṛttiḥ kasmādbuddhyā na gṛhyate //
S04bsu021_u:4308: Lank_10.397 udeti bhāskaro yadvatsamaṃ hīnottame jane /
S04bsu021_u:4309: tathā tvaṃ lokapradyota tattvaṃ deśesi bāliśān //
S04bsu021_u:4310: Lank_10.398 kṛtvā dharmeṣvavasthānaṃ kasmāttattvaṃ na bhāṣase /
S04bsu021_u:4311: bhāṣase yadi tattvaṃ vai tattvaṃ citte na vidyate //
S04bsu021_u:4312: Lank_10.399 udadheryathā taraṃgāṇi darpaṇe supine yathā /
S04bsu021_u:4315: Lank_10.400 vijñānena vijānāti manasā manyate punaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4316: pañcānāṃ khyāyate dṛśyaṃ kramo nāsti samāhite //
S04bsu021_u:4319: Lank_10.402 raṅge na vidyate citraṃ na kuḍye na ca bhājane /
S04bsu021_u:4322: kṛtvā dharme vyavasthānaṃ tattvaṃ deśemi yoginām //
S04bsu021_u:4325: Lank_10.405 vicitrā hi yathā māyā dṛśyate na ca vidyate /
S04bsu021_u:4329: buddhā hi tadvatsattvānāṃ cittamātraṃ vadanti te //
S04bsu021_u:4331: tantraṃ hi yena gṛhṇāti yadgṛhṇāti sa kalpitam //
S04bsu021_u:4332: Lank_10.408 bāhyamālambanaṃ gṛhyaṃ cittaṃ cāśritya jāyate /
S04bsu021_u:4334: Lank_10.409 yasmācca jāyate bhrāntiryadāśritya ca jāyate /
S04bsu021_u:4341: saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtaṃ nityaṃ kalpyate na ca vidyate //
S04bsu021_u:4343: asanto vā vidṛśyante paratantraṃ tathā bhavet //
S04bsu021_u:4346: Lank_10.415 cittaṃ manaśca vijñānaṃ nairātmyaṃ syāddvayaṃ tathā /
S04bsu021_u:4347: pañca dharmāḥ svabhāvā hi buddhānāṃ gocaro hyayam //
S04bsu021_u:4349: raṅgaṃ hi yathāpyekaṃ kuḍye citraṃ vidṛśyate //
S04bsu021_u:4351: pañca dharmāḥ svabhāvā hi mama gotre na santi te //
S04bsu021_u:4354: Lank_10.419 kāyena vācā manasā na tatra kriyate śubham /
S04bsu021_u:4357: kāyaṃ manomayaṃ cittaṃ gotraṃ tāthāgataṃ śubham //
S04bsu021_u:4367: kurvanti jinaputrā vai nṛpatvaṃ ca bhavālaye //
S04bsu021_u:4368: Lank_10.426 utpādamatha notpādaṃ śūnyāśūnyaṃ na kalpayet /
S04bsu021_u:4370: Lank_10.427 idaṃ tathyamidaṃ tathyamidaṃ mithyā vikalpayet /
S04bsu021_u:4372: Lank_10.428 saccāsacca sato naiva kṣaṇikaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ na vai /
S04bsu021_u:4374: Lank_10.429 bhāvā vidyanti saṃvṛtyā paramārthe na bhāvakāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4376: Lank_10.430 asatsu sarvadharmeṣu prajñaptiḥ kriyate mayā /
S04bsu021_u:4379: abhilāpasaṃbhavo bhāvo dṛṣṭvā vai nāsti vidyate //
S04bsu021_u:4380: Lank_10.432 kuḍyābhāve yathā citraṃ chāyāyāṃ sthāṇuvarjite /
S04bsu021_u:4381: ālayaṃ tu tathā śuddhaṃ taraṃge na virājate //
S04bsu021_u:4386: Lank_10.435 dṛśyaṃ na vidyate cittaṃ cittaṃ dṛśyātpramuhyate /
S04bsu021_u:4388: Lank_10.436 cittaṃ manaśca vijñānaṃ svabhāvaṃ dharmapañcakam /
S04bsu021_u:4390: Lank_10.437 tārkikāṇāmaviṣayaṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ na caiva hi /
S04bsu021_u:4394: Lank_10.439 aṇuśo vibhajya dravyaṃ na vai rūpaṃ vikalpayet /
S04bsu021_u:4396: Lank_10.440 mā śūnyatāṃ vikalpetha māśūnyamiti vā punaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4400: Lank_10.442 svacittaṃ dṛśyasaṃsthānaṃ bahirdhā khyāyate nṛṇām /
S04bsu021_u:4401: bāhyaṃ na vidyate dṛśyamato 'pyarthaṃ na vidyate //
S04bsu021_u:4402: Lank_10.443 citraṃ keśoṇḍukaṃ māyāṃ svapna gandharvameva ca /
S04bsu021_u:4403: alātaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇā ca asantaṃ khyāyate nṛṇām //
S04bsu021_u:4411: tathā ca śrāvako mūḍho lakṣaṇena pravāhyate //
S04bsu021_u:4412: Lank_10.448 niṣṭhāgatirna tattasyā na ca bhūyo nivartate /
S04bsu021_u:4416: Lank_10.450 yathā hi mattaḥ puruṣo madyābhāvādvibudhyate /
S04bsu021_u:4417: tathā te buddhadharmākhyaṃ kāyaṃ prāpsyanti māmakam //
S04bsu021_u:4418: Lank_10.451 paṅkamagno yathā hastī itastato na dhāvati /
S04bsu021_u:4422: Lank_10.453 ākāśaṃ śaśaśṛṅgaṃ ca vandhyāyāḥ putra eva ca /
S04bsu021_u:4427: niṣpannaṃ tathatetyuktaṃ sūtre sūtre sadā mayā //
S04bsu021_u:4428: Lank_10.456 vyañjanaṃ padakāyaṃ ca nāma cāpi viśeṣataḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4429: bālāḥ sajanti durmedhā yathā paṅke mahāgajāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:4430: Lank_10.457 devayānaṃ brahmayānaṃ śrāvakīyaṃ tathaiva ca /
S04bsu021_u:4432: Lank_10.458 yānānāṃ nāsti vai niṣṭhā yāvaccittaṃ pravartate /
S04bsu021_u:4433: citte tu vai parāvṛtte na yānaṃ na ca yāyinaḥ //
S04bsu021_u:4434: Lank_10.459 cittaṃ vikalpo vijñaptirmano vijñānameva ca /
S04bsu021_u:4438: Lank_10.461 cittena dhāryate kāyo mano manyati vai sadā /
S04bsu021_u:4440: Lank_10.462 tṛṣṇā hi mātā ityuktā avidyā ca tathā pitā /
S04bsu021_u:4442: Lank_10.463 arhanto hyanuśayāḥ skandhāḥ saṃghaḥ skandhakapañcakaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4446: Lank_10.465 siddhāntaśca nayaścāpi pratyātmaṃ śāsanaṃ ca vai /
S04bsu021_u:4447: ye paśyanti vibhāgajñā na te tarkavaśaṃ gatāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:4448: Lank_10.466 na bhāvo vidyate satyaṃ yathā bālairvikalpyate /
S04bsu021_u:4449: abhāvena tu vai mokṣaṃ kathaṃ necchanti tārkikāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:4451: dṛṣṭidvayaṃ prapuṣṇanti na ca jānanti pratyayān //
S04bsu021_u:4454: Lank_10.469 rāgo na vidyate dveṣo mohaścāpi na pudgalaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4456: Lank_10.470 yasyāṃ ca rātryāṃ dhigamo yasyāṃ ca parinirvṛtaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4459: taiśca buddhairmayā caiva na ca kiṃcidviśeṣitam //
S04bsu021_u:4461: skandhā vidyanti bhāvena ātmā teṣu na vidyate //
S04bsu021_u:4464: Lank_10.474 kāraṇaiḥ pratyayaiścāpi yeṣāṃ lokaḥ pravartate /
S04bsu021_u:4466: Lank_10.475 sadasanna jāyate loko nāsanna sadasatkvacit /
S04bsu021_u:4468: Lank_10.476 na sannāsanna sadasadyadā lokaṃ prapaśyati /
S04bsu021_u:4471: kāryaṃ hi pratyayāḥ sarve na kāryājjāyate bhavaḥ //
S04bsu021_u:4472: Lank_10.478 kāryaṃ na jāyate kāryaṃ dvitvaṃ kārye prasajyate /
S04bsu021_u:4478: Lank_10.481 prajñaptisatyato hyātmā dravyaḥ sa hi na vidyate /
S04bsu021_u:4479: skandhānāṃ skandhatā tadvatprajñaptyā na tu dravyataḥ //
S04bsu021_u:4480: Lank_10.482 caturvidhā vai samatā lakṣaṇaṃ hetubhājanam /
S04bsu021_u:4484: Lank_10.484 na bhāvaṃ nāpi cābhāvaṃ bhāvābhāvavivarjitam /
S04bsu021_u:4486: Lank_10.485 tathatā śūnyatā koṭī nirvāṇaṃ dharmadhātukam /
S04bsu021_u:4489: bahirdhā jāyate nṝṇāṃ cittamātraṃ hi laukikam //
S04bsu021_u:4490: Lank_10.487 dṛśyaṃ na vidyate bāhyaṃ cittacitraṃ vidṛśyate /
S04bsu021_u:4494: Lank_10.489 bahirdhā nāsti vai rūpaṃ svacittaṃ dṛśyate bahiḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4498: Lank_10.491 na hetavo na koṭyo vai dṛṣṭāntāvayavāni ca /
S04bsu021_u:4504: Lank_10.494 vikalpaṃ cittacaittārthī tribhave ca pratiṣṭhitāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4508: Lank_10.496 yathā hi darpaṇe bimbaṃ keśoṇḍustimirasya vā /
S04bsu021_u:4509: tathā hi vāsanaiśchannaṃ cittaṃ paśyanti bāliśāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:4511: artho na vidyate bāhyo yathā tīrthyairvikalpyate //
S04bsu021_u:4512: Lank_10.498 rajjuṃ yathā hyajānānāḥ sarpaṃ gṛhṇanti bāliśāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4514: Lank_10.499 tathā hi rajjuṃ rajjutve ekatvānyatvavarjitam /
S04bsu021_u:4516: Lank_10.500 na hi yo yena bhāvena kalpyamāno na lakṣyate /
S04bsu021_u:4519: ato nāsti na gantavyaṃ astitvaṃ na ca kalpayet //
S04bsu021_u:4520: Lank_10.502 kalpitaṃ kalpyamānaṃ hi yadidaṃ na tadātmakam /
S04bsu021_u:4522: Lank_10.503 rūpaṃ rūpātmanā nāsti tathā ghaṭapaṭādayaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4525: bhāvānāṃ bhāvatā kena bhrāmitā brūhi me mune //
S04bsu021_u:4526: Lank_10.505 bhāvānāṃ bhāvatā nāsti cittamātraṃ ca dṛśyate /
S04bsu021_u:4528: Lank_10.506 kalpitaṃ yadi vai nāsti yathā kalpati bāliśaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4529: anyathā vidyate cāsau na ca buddhyāvagamyate //
S04bsu021_u:4530: Lank_10.507 āryāṇāṃ yadi vā so 'sti nāsau bālairvikalpitaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4531: āryāṇāmatha mithyāsau āryā bālaiḥ samaṃ gatāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:4532: Lank_10.508 āryāṇāṃ nāsti vai bhrāntiryasmāccittaṃ viśodhitam /
S04bsu021_u:4534: Lank_10.509 mātā yathā hi putrasya ākāśātphalamānayet /
S04bsu021_u:4535: etaddhi putra mā kranda gṛhṇa citramidaṃ phalam //
S04bsu021_u:4536: Lank_10.510 tathāhaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ vicitraiḥ kalpitaiḥ phalaiḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4538: Lank_10.511 abhūtvā yasya vai bhāvaḥ pratyayairna ca saṃkulaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4540: Lank_10.512 alabdhātmakaṃ hyajātaṃ ca pratyayairna vinā kvacit /
S04bsu021_u:4541: utpannamapi te bhāvo pratyayairna vinā kvacit //
S04bsu021_u:4542: Lank_10.513 evaṃ samāsataḥ paśyan nāsanna sadasatkvacit /
S04bsu021_u:4547: arthaṃ sunītaṃ hi mayā na ca budhyanti bāliśāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:4550: Lank_10.517 lakṣaṇaṃ bhāva saṃsthānaṃ nāma caiva caturvidham /
S04bsu021_u:4552: Lank_10.518 ekadhā bahudhā ye tu brahmakāyavaśaṃgatāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4553: somabhāskarayorbhāvā ye nāśenti na te sutāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:4556: Lank_10.520 eṣā hi mudrā muktānāṃ putrāṇāṃ mama śāsane /
S04bsu021_u:4558: Lank_10.521 vyāvṛtte rūpavijñāne yadi karma vinaśyati /
S04bsu021_u:4559: nityānityaṃ na prāpnoti saṃsāraśca na vidyate //
S04bsu021_u:4562: Lank_10.523 pradhvaṃsi patitaṃ rūpaṃ vijñānaṃ ca bhavālaye /
S04bsu021_u:4564: Lank_10.524 atha taiḥ saha saṃbaddhaṃ karma vai dhvasyate nṛṇām /
S04bsu021_u:4565: dhvaste tu karmasaṃbandhe na saṃsṛtirna nirvṛtiḥ //
S04bsu021_u:4566: Lank_10.525 atha dhvastamapi taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃsāre yadi jāyate /
S04bsu021_u:4568: Lank_10.526 nābhinnaṃ na ca vai bhinnaṃ cittaṃ rūpaṃ vikalpanāt /
S04bsu021_u:4573: nāstyasti kathaṃ bhavati rūpe cānityatā yathā //
S04bsu021_u:4574: Lank_10.529 kalpitena sudṛṣṭena paratantro na jāyate /
S04bsu021_u:4576: Lank_10.530 kalpitaṃ hi vināśete mama netrī vinaśyate /
S04bsu021_u:4578: Lank_10.531 evaṃvidhā yadā yasmin kāle syurdharmadūṣakāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4579: sarve ca te hyasaṃkathyā mama netrīvināśakāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:4584: Lank_10.534 nāsau śikṣati buddhānāṃ yasteṣāṃ saṃgrahe caret /
S04bsu021_u:4586: Lank_10.535 viviktaṃ kalpitaṃ bhāvaṃ ye tu paśyanti yoginaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4588: Lank_10.536 ākarā hi yathā loke suvarṇamaṇimuktijāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4590: Lank_10.537 tathā hi sattvagotrāṇi citrā vai karmavarjitā /
S04bsu021_u:4591: dṛśyābhāvānna karmāsti na ca vai karmajā gatiḥ //
S04bsu021_u:4592: Lank_10.538 bhāvānāṃ bhāvatā nāsti yathā tvāryairvibhāvyate /
S04bsu021_u:4593: kiṃ tu vidyanti vai bhāvā yathā bālairvikalpitāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:4594: Lank_10.539 yadi bhāvā va vidyante yathā bālairvikalpitāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4598: Lank_10.541 yeṣāṃ tu bhāvo vai nāsti yathā bālairvikalpitaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4599: teṣāṃ na vidyate vṛttirindriyāṇāṃ na yoginaḥ //
S04bsu021_u:4600: Lank_10.542 yadi bhāvā na vidyante bhāvasaṃsārahetavaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4604: Lank_10.544 skandhāśca pudgalā dharmāḥ svasāmānyā alakṣaṇāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4611: kalpito nāsti vai bhāvaḥ kalpayiṣyanti tārkikāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:4618: Lank_10.551 ādimān hi bhavelloko yadyabhūtvā pravartate /
S04bsu021_u:4622: Lank_10.553 yadyabhūtvā bhaveccakṣū rūpaṃ vijñānameva ca /
S04bsu021_u:4624: Lank_10.554 paṭaiśca vai kaṭo nāsti paṭo vai vīraṇaistathā /
S04bsu021_u:4625: eka ekatrā saṃbhūtaḥ pratyayaiḥ kiṃ na jāyate //
S04bsu021_u:4626: Lank_10.555 tajjīvaṃ taccharīraṃ ca yaccābhūtvā pravartate /
S04bsu021_u:4627: paravādā hyamī sarve mayā ca samudāhṛtāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:4628: Lank_10.556 uccārya pūrvapakṣaṃ ca matisteṣāṃ nivāryate /
S04bsu021_u:4634: Lank_10.559 na bhūtaṃ nāpi cābhūtaṃ pratyayairna ca pratyayāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4639: ahetukaṃ sadā paśyan vikalpo na pravartate //
S04bsu021_u:4643: Lank_10.563 vastu na vidyate paśyaṃścittamātraṃ na vidyate /
S04bsu021_u:4644: avastukaṃ kathaṃ cittaṃ cittamātraṃ na yujyate //
S04bsu021_u:4646: ahetukaṃ kathaṃ cittaṃ cittamātraṃ na yujyate //
S04bsu021_u:4647: Lank_10.565 tathatā cittamātraṃ ca āryavastunayasya tu /
S04bsu021_u:4648: vidyante na ca vidyante na te mannayakovidāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:4650: etaddhi laukikaṃ cittaṃ cittamātraṃ na yujyate //
S04bsu021_u:4652: dvicittatā prasajyeta na ca cittaṃ dvilakṣaṇam //
S04bsu021_u:4653: Lank_10.568 svadhāraṃ hi yathā khaḍgaṃ svāgraṃ vai aṅguliryathā /
S04bsu021_u:4654: na chindate na spṛśate tathā cittaṃ svadarśane //
S04bsu021_u:4655: Lank_10.569 na paraṃ na ca vai tantraṃ kalpitaṃ vastumeva ca /
S04bsu021_u:4656: pañca dharmā dvicittaṃ ca nirābhāse na santi vai //
S04bsu021_u:4657: Lank_10.570 utpādakaṃ ca utpādyaṃ dvividhaṃ bhāvalakṣaṇam /
S04bsu021_u:4659: Lank_10.571 atha vaicitryasaṃsthāne kalpā ca yadi jāyate /
S04bsu021_u:4663: Lank_10.573 anādimati saṃsāre artho vai nāsti kutracit /
S04bsu021_u:4666: na cābhāvena vai puṣṭo vikalpaḥ saṃpravartate //
S04bsu021_u:4667: Lank_10.575 yathāpi dānīṃ naivāsti tathā pūrve 'pi nāstyasau /
S04bsu021_u:4673: Lank_10.578 cittaṃ khyāti na dṛśyo 'sti viśeṣo 'nādihetukaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4675: Lank_10.579 yadyabhāvena puṣṭiḥ syāddaridro dhanavān bhavet /
S04bsu021_u:4676: arthābhāve kathaṃ cittaṃ jāyate brūhi me mune //
S04bsu021_u:4677: Lank_10.580 ahetukamidaṃ sarvaṃ na cittaṃ na ca gocaraḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4678: na ca vai puṣyate cittaṃ tribhavaṃ kriyavarjitam //
S04bsu021_u:4681: anutpannamidaṃ sarvaṃ na ca bhāvā na santi ca //
S04bsu021_u:4683: anutpannān svabhāvāṃśca śūnyāḥ kena vadāsi me //
S04bsu021_u:4684: Lank_10.583 samavāyavinirmukto yadā bhāvo na dṛśyate /
S04bsu021_u:4689: na tu tīrthyadṛṣṭyā pralayo samavāyo na vidyate //
S04bsu021_u:4691: anutpādaiḥ prasādhyante mama netrī na naśyati //
S04bsu021_u:4693: kathaṃ kena kutaḥ kutra saṃbhavo 'hetuko bhavet //
S04bsu021_u:4697: atha bhāvasya nāmedaṃ nirarthaṃ vā bravīhi me //
S04bsu021_u:4698: Lank_10.590 na ca bhāvo hyanutpādo na ca pratyayalakṣaṇam /
S04bsu021_u:4699: na ca bhāvasya nāmedaṃ na ca nāma nirarthakam //
S04bsu021_u:4700: Lank_10.591 yatra śrāvakabuddhānāṃ tīrthyānāṃ ca agocaraḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4708: Lank_10.595 na bāhyabhāvaṃ bhāvānāṃ na ca cittaparigraham /
S04bsu021_u:4711: na jātu śūnyayā śūnyā kiṃ tvanutpādaśūnyayā //
S04bsu021_u:4712: Lank_10.597 kalāpaḥ pratyayānāṃ hi pravartate nivartate /
S04bsu021_u:4713: kalapācca pṛthagbhūtaṃ na jātaṃ na nirudhyate //
S04bsu021_u:4714: Lank_10.598 bhāvo na vidyate hyanyaḥ kalāpācca pṛthak kvacit /
S04bsu021_u:4716: Lank_10.599 sadasanna jāyate bhāvo nāsanna sadasatkvacit /
S04bsu021_u:4722: Lank_10.602 yasya janyo hi bhāvo 'sti saṃkalāyāḥ pṛthak kvacit /
S04bsu021_u:4730: Lank_10.606 yadā sarvamimaṃ lokaṃ saṃkalāmeva paśyati /
S04bsu021_u:4734: Lank_10.608 parato yasya vai bhāvaḥ pratyayairjāyate kvacit /
S04bsu021_u:4735: na saṃkalāmātramevedaṃ na te yuktyāgame sthitāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:4736: Lank_10.609 yadi janyo na bhāvo 'sti syādbuddhiḥ kasya pratyayāt /
S04bsu021_u:4737: anyonyapratyayā hyete te tena pratyayāḥ smṛtāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:4739: kalāpo 'yaṃ na dharmo 'sti ato vai niḥsvabhāvatā //
S04bsu021_u:4741: na tu śāstrasya bhedo 'sti doṣabhedastu vidyate //
S04bsu021_u:4743: indriyāṇāṃ balaṃ jñātvā nayaṃ deśemi bāliśān //
S04bsu021_u:4744: Lank_10.613 na kleśendriyabhedena śāsanaṃ bhidyate mama /
S04bsu021_u:4748: Lank_10.615 astitvasādhakaṃ nāsti nāsti nāsti na yujyate /
S04bsu021_u:4750: Lank_10.616 kiṃcidāśritya punaḥ kiṃcitkhyāyate yasya vai matam /
S04bsu021_u:4753: anavasthā prasajyeta kiṃcicca kiṃ ca no bhavet //
S04bsu021_u:4754: Lank_10.618 āśritya parṇakāṣṭhādīn yathā māyā prasajyate /
S04bsu021_u:4756: Lank_10.619 māyājālaṃ na parṇāni na kāṣṭhaṃ na ca śarkarā /
S04bsu021_u:4758: Lank_10.620 tathā vastu samāśritya yadi kiṃcidvinaśyati /
S04bsu021_u:4760: Lank_10.621 vikalpairvikalpitaṃ nāsti vikalpaśca na vidyate /
S04bsu021_u:4761: vikalpe hyavidyamāne tu na saṃsṛtirna nirvṛtiḥ //
S04bsu021_u:4762: Lank_10.622 vikalpe hyavidyamāne tu vikalpo na pravartate /
S04bsu021_u:4763: apravṛttiṃ kathaṃ cittaṃ cittamātraṃ na yujyate //
S04bsu021_u:4766: Lank_10.624 bāhyaṃ na vidyate dṛśyaṃ yathā bālairvikalpyate /
S04bsu021_u:4770: Lank_10.626 bālairbhāvāḥ samākhyātāḥ pratyayairna tu paṇḍitaiḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4772: Lank_10.627 sāṃkhyā vaiśeṣikā nagnā viprāḥ pāśupatāstathā /
S04bsu021_u:4777: buddhā deśenti vai yogaṃ mayā ca prativarṇitāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:4778: Lank_10.630 yadi cittamidaṃ sarvaṃ kasmiṃllokaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4782: Lank_10.632 tathā hi dehinaḥ sarve vikalpena samīritāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4785: ābhā vṛttiḥ kathaṃ kena cittamātraṃ vadāhi me //
S04bsu021_u:4790: Lank_10.636 nāma nāmni visaṃyuktaṃ yadā paśyati kalpitam /
S04bsu021_u:4792: Lank_10.637 etā buddhirbhavedbodhyaṃ nāma nāmni vibhāvanam /
S04bsu021_u:4793: ye tvanyathāvabudhyante na te buddhā na bodhakāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:4794: Lank_10.638 pañca dharmāḥ svabhāvāśca vijñānānyaṣṭa eva ca /
S04bsu021_u:4796: Lank_10.639 yadā buddhiśca boddhavyaṃ viviktaṃ paśyate jagat /
S04bsu021_u:4800: Lank_10.641 catvāro 'rūpiṇaḥ skandhāḥ saṃkhyā teṣāṃ na vidyate /
S04bsu021_u:4802: Lank_10.642 lakṣaṇasya parityāgānna bhūtaṃ na ca bhautikam /
S04bsu021_u:4808: Lank_10.645 ālayaṃ hi manasyātmā ātmīyaṃ jñānameva ca /
S04bsu021_u:4811: tadā dvayaṃ na kalpanti ātmā cātmīyameva ca //
S04bsu021_u:4812: Lank_10.647 apravṛttaṃ na puṣṇāti na ca vijñānakāraṇam /
S04bsu021_u:4814: Lank_10.648 vikalpaṃ cittamātraṃ ca lokaṃ kena vadāhi me /
S04bsu021_u:4816: Lank_10.649 svacittaṃ dṛśyate citraṃ dṛśyākāraṃ vikalpitam /
S04bsu021_u:4818: Lank_10.650 nāstitvadṛṣṭirbhavati yadā buddhyā na paśyati /
S04bsu021_u:4819: astitvaṃ hi kathaṃ tasya cittagrāhānna jāyate //
S04bsu021_u:4820: Lank_10.651 vikalpo na bhāvo nābhāvo ato 'stitvaṃ na jāyate /
S04bsu021_u:4824: Lank_10.653 saṃjñāntaraviśeṣo 'yaṃ kṛtaṃ kena na sādhitaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4828: Lank_10.655 na saṃbhavo na vibhavo anityatvāddhi bāliśām /
S04bsu021_u:4829: na hi naśyamānaṃ kiṃcidvai kāraṇatvena dṛśyate //
S04bsu021_u:4830: Lank_10.656 adṛṣṭaṃ hi kathaṃ kena nānityo jāyate bhavaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4837: cittamātraṃ na dṛśyo 'sti dvidhā cittaṃ vidṛśyate /
S04bsu021_u:4846: gatayaḥ ṣaṭ samākhyātā yatra jāyanti dehinaḥ //
S04bsu021_u:4848: saraṃkṣya kuśalān sarvān viśeṣo mokṣa eva vā //
S04bsu021_u:4849: Lank_10.665 kṣaṇe kṣaṇe tvayā yanmaraṇaṃ upapattiṃ ca /
S04bsu021_u:4853: Lank_10.667 rūpe rūpe vikalpasya saṃbhavo vibhavastathā /
S04bsu021_u:4856: rūpagrāhavinirmuktaṃ na janma na ca bhajyate //
S04bsu021_u:4859: Lank_10.670 pratyayāḥ pratyayotpannā yadi dharmā viśeṣitāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4863: Lank_10.672 śarīre vyāmamātre ca lokaṃ vai lokasamudayam /
S04bsu021_u:4868: nivārārthaṃ tu dṛṣṭīnāṃ svabhāvaṃ na vikalpayet //
S04bsu021_u:4869: Lank_10.675 chidradoṣānna niyamo na vā cittaṃ pravartate /
S04bsu021_u:4871: Lank_10.676 ajñāna tṛṣṇā karma ca vijñānādyā ayonijāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4872: anavasthākṛtakatvaṃ ca na kṛtvā jāyate bhavaḥ //
S04bsu021_u:4881: Lank_10.680 yathāhamanye ca sadā nāstyasti na visaṃkaret /
S04bsu021_u:4887: bhāvā hi sarve svavikalpasaṃbhavāstīrthyā vikalpenti jagatsvakāraṇaiḥ //
S04bsu021_u:4890: Lank_10.684 hastaḥ karo yathā loke indraḥ śakraḥ puraṃdaraḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4892: Lank_10.685 rūpācca śūnyatā nānyā anutpādaṃ tathaiva ca /
S04bsu021_u:4896: Lank_10.687 saṃkalpo hi bhaveccittaṃ parikalpo manastathā /
S04bsu021_u:4904: Lank_10.691 bhāvā vidyantyanutpannā na vā brūhi mahāmune /
S04bsu021_u:4918: Lank_10.697 pūrvottaravirodhaṃ ca sarvaṃ bhāṣya mahāmune /
S04bsu021_u:4925: maṇḍalaṃ hi na me kiṃcinna ca deśemi dharmatām //
S04bsu021_u:4926: Lank_10.701 dvaye sati hi doṣaḥ syāddvayaṃ buddhairviśodhitam /
S04bsu021_u:4929: pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca vikalpasya vadāhi me //
S04bsu021_u:4930: Lank_10.703 yathā yena prakāreṇa jāyate viṣayo mukham /
S04bsu021_u:4932: Lank_10.704 rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā bahirdhā vai vikalpaḥ saṃpravartate /
S04bsu021_u:4935: Lank_10.705 pratyākhyāya tu bhūtāni bhāvotpattirna vidyate /
S04bsu021_u:4937: Lank_10.706 mā vikalpaṃ vikalpetha nirvikalpā hi paṇḍitāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4939: Lank_10.707 anutpādapratijñasya māyā ca dṛśyate nayaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4944: dṛśyate na ca tannāsti tathā cotpādalakṣaṇam //
S04bsu021_u:4946: tathā hi sarvabhāvānāṃ saṃbhavo na hyasaṃbhavaḥ //
S04bsu021_u:4955: Lank_10.715 aṅgulyagraṃ yathā bālaiścandraṃ gṛhṇanti durmatiḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4960: vāyunā kīryate rūpaṃ kathaṃ bhūtaiḥ pravartate //
S04bsu021_u:4961: Lank_10.718 rūpaṃ skandhaśca vijñānaṃ dvayametanna pañcakam /
S04bsu021_u:4964: vyatibhinnāni rūpāṇi cittaṃ rūpaṃ na bhautikam //
S04bsu021_u:4965: Lank_10.720 nīlādyapekṣaṇaṃ śvetaṃ śvetaṃ nīlaṃ hyapekṣaṇam /
S04bsu021_u:4967: Lank_10.721 sādhanaṃ sādhakaṃ sādhyaṃ śītoṣṇe lakṣyalakṣaṇam /
S04bsu021_u:4974: tīrthyā vadanti janma bhūtānāṃ bhautikasya ca //
S04bsu021_u:4975: Lank_10.725 anutpannā yato ye 'nye tīrthyāḥ kalpanti kāraṇaiḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4977: Lank_10.726 cittena saha saṃyuktaṃ visaṃyuktaṃ manādibhiḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4988: tīrthyavādo na saṃdeho na ca budhyanti tārkikāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:4989: Lank_10.732 rūpaṃ ca vidyate tatra ārūpye nāsti darśanam /
S04bsu021_u:4990: tadabhāvo na siddhānto na yānaṃ na ca yāyinam //
S04bsu021_u:4991: Lank_10.733 indriyaiḥ saha saṃyuktaṃ vijñānaṃ vāsanodbhavam /
S04bsu021_u:4992: aṣṭavidhaikadeśaṃ hi kṣaṇe kāle na gṛhṇanti //
S04bsu021_u:4993: Lank_10.734 na pravartati yadā rūpaṃ indriyā na ca indriyaiḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4994: ato hi deśeti bhagavān kṣaṇikā indriyādayaḥ //
S04bsu021_u:4995: Lank_10.735 anirdhārya kathaṃ rūpaṃ vijñānaṃ saṃpravartsyate /
S04bsu021_u:4997: Lank_10.736 utpattyanantaraṃ bhaṅgaṃ na deśenti vināyakāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:4999: Lank_10.737 indriyā indriyārthāśca mūḍhānāṃ na tu paṇḍitāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:5000: bālā gṛhṇanti nāmena āryā vai arthakovidāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:5001: Lank_10.738 ṣaṣṭhaṃ hi nirupādānaḥ sopādāno na gṛhyate /
S04bsu021_u:5005: Lank_10.740 ekatve vidyate dānamanyatve cāpi vidyate /
S04bsu021_u:5007: Lank_10.741 nirdhāryate yadā dānaṃ cittaṃ caittābhiśabditam /
S04bsu021_u:5012: sopādānastathā hyātmā tārkikaiḥ kiṃ na gṛhyate //
S04bsu021_u:5014: dṛṣṭāntaṃ kiṃ na kurvanti tārkikā ātmasādhakāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:5020: lakṣaṇaṃ yadi jānāti jñānaṃ saṃjāyate nayam //
S04bsu021_u:5022: ātmanā saha saṃyuktaṃ na ca dharmāḥ prakīrtitāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:5025: Lank_10.750 prakṛtiprabhāsvaraṃ cittaṃ garbhaṃ tāthāgataṃ śubham /
S04bsu021_u:5027: Lank_10.751 kāntiryathā suvarṇasya jātarūpaṃ ca śarkaram /
S04bsu021_u:5029: Lank_10.752 na pudgalo na ca skandhā buddho jñānamanāsravam /
S04bsu021_u:5033: Lank_10.754 prakṛtiprabhāsvaraṃ cittaṃ manādyastasya vai paraḥ /
S04bsu021_u:5037: Lank_10.756 malābhāvādyathā vastraṃ hemaṃ vā doṣavarjitam /
S04bsu021_u:5038: tiṣṭhanti na ca naśyante ātmā doṣaistathā vinā //
S04bsu021_u:5042: vidyamānā na dṛśyanti tathā skandheṣu pudgalam //
S04bsu021_u:5044: akovidā na gṛhṇanti tathā skandheṣu pudgalam //
S04bsu021_u:5045: Lank_10.760 yathā hi garbho garbhiṇyāṃ vidyate na ca dṛśyate /
S04bsu021_u:5046: ātmā hi tadvatskandheṣu ayuktijño na paśyati //
S04bsu021_u:5047: Lank_10.761 auṣadhīnāṃ yathā sāramagniṃ vā indhanairyathā /
S04bsu021_u:5049: Lank_10.762 anityatāṃ sarvabhāveṣu śūnyatāṃ ca yathābudhāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:5050: vidyamānāṃ na paśyanti tathā skandheṣu pudgalam //
S04bsu021_u:5051: Lank_10.763 bhūmayo vaśitābhijñā abhiṣekaṃ ca uttaram /
S04bsu021_u:5053: Lank_10.764 vaināśiko yadā gatvā brūyādyadyasti deśyatām /
S04bsu021_u:5060: svarasaṃ vidyate teṣu anāsvādyaṃ na gṛhyate //
S04bsu021_u:5062: na ca paśyantyavidvāṃso vidvān dṛṣṭvā vimucyate //
S04bsu021_u:5065: Lank_10.770 vilakṣaṇā hi vai dharmāścittamekaṃ na gṛhyate /
S04bsu021_u:5067: Lank_10.771 cittānupaśyī ca yogī cittaṃ citte na paśyati /
S04bsu021_u:5071: Lank_10.773 paurāṇikamidaṃ vartma ahaṃ te ca tathāgatāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:5073: Lank_10.774 kāmadhātau tathārūpye na vai buddho vibudhyate /
S04bsu021_u:5077: Lank_10.776 asatyātmani māyādyā dharmā nāstyasti vai katham /
S04bsu021_u:5078: bālānāṃ khyāti tathatā kathaṃ nāsti nirātmikā //
S04bsu021_u:5081: Lank_10.778 kāraṇāni anutpannā kṛtakāḥ pratyayāśca te /
S04bsu021_u:5082: dvāvapyetau na janakau kāraṇaiḥ kalpyate katham //
S04bsu021_u:5090: bālānāṃ ca viśeṣeṇa brahmacaryaṃ na vidyate //
S04bsu021_u:5092: vyañjitaiḥ pravrajantyeke na cānye ca pravādinaḥ //
S04bsu021_u:5093: Lank_10.784 vyāsaḥ kaṇādaḥ ṛṣabhaḥ kapilaḥ śākyanāyakaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:5095: Lank_10.785 mayi nirvṛte varṣaśate vyāso vai bhāratastathā /
S04bsu021_u:5097: Lank_10.786 mauryā nandāśca guptāśca tato mlecchā nṛpādhamāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:5099: kaliyugānte lokaiśca saddharmo hi na bhāvitaḥ //
S04bsu021_u:5102: Lank_10.788 punaḥ saṃsthāsyate divyaṃ tasmiṃllokaḥ pravartsyate /
S04bsu021_u:5103: cātuṃ rvarṇā nṛpendrāśca ṛṣayo dharmameva ca //
S04bsu021_u:5104: Lank_10.789 vedāśca yajñaṃ dānaṃ ca dharmasthā vartsyate punaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:5106: evaṃ mayā śrutādibhyo loko vai vibhramiṣyati //
S04bsu021_u:5110: Lank_10.791 śāsanaṃ deśayedyogī buddhānāmeṣa vai dhvajaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:5111: vastrapūtaṃ jalaṃ peyaṃ kaṭisūtraṃ ca dhārayet /
S04bsu021_u:5113: Lank_10.792 divyaṃ saṃjāyate svargāddvau cānyau mānuṣodbhavau /
S04bsu021_u:5117: Lank_10.794 kṛtayugaśca tretā ca dvāparaṃ kalinastathā /
S04bsu021_u:5118: ahaṃ cānye kṛtayuge śākyasiṃhaḥ kalau yuge //
S04bsu021_u:5121: Lank_10.796 evaṃ mayā śrutādibhyaḥ śākyasiṃhasya deśanā /
S04bsu021_u:5125: Lank_10.798 mātā ca me vasumatiḥ pitā vipraḥ prajāpatiḥ /
S04bsu021_u:5127: Lank_10.799 campāyāṃ haṃ samutpannaḥ pitāpi ca pitāmahaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:5129: Lank_10.800 cīrṇavrataḥ pravrajitaḥ sahasraṃ deśitaṃ nayam /
S04bsu021_u:5131: Lank_10.801 matirdāsyati dharmāya dharmo dāsyati mekhale /
S04bsu021_u:5134: ahaṃ ca virajo 'nye vai sarve te kṛtino jināḥ //
S04bsu021_u:5135: Lank_10.803 kṛte yuge tataḥ paścānmatirnāmena nāyakaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:5137: Lank_10.804 na dvāpare na tretāyāṃ na paścācca kalau yuge /
S04bsu021_u:5141: Lank_10.806 dvayaṅgulaṃ tryaṅgulaṃ vāpi candraṃ candrāntaraṃ bhavet /
S04bsu021_u:5142: anyathā citryamānaṃ hi lobhanīyaṃ hi bāliśān //
S04bsu021_u:5147: Lank_10.809 ekaṃ ca bahudhā nāsti vailakṣaṇyānna kutracit /
S04bsu021_u:5149: Lank_10.810 yadyekaṃ bahudhā vai syātsarve hyakṛtakā bhavet /
S04bsu021_u:5152: ekaṃ hi bahudhā bhavati tārkikāṇāmayaṃ nayaḥ //
S04bsu021_u:5153: Lank_10.812 na tilājjāyate mudgo na vrīhiryavahetukaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:5167: Lank_10.819 bhaviṣyati mahāyogī nāmnā vai virajo muniḥ /
S04bsu021_u:5168: mokṣasya deśakaḥ śāstā munīnāmeṣa vai dhvajaḥ //
S04bsu021_u:5169: Lank_10.820 brahmā brahmaśataiḥ sārdhaṃ devaiśca bahubhirmama /
S04bsu021_u:5171: Lank_10.821 sarvacitrāṇi vāsāṃsi bhaikṣyapātraṃ suraiḥ saha /
S04bsu021_u:5175: Lank_10.823 tasyāvidyā kāraṇaṃ teṣāṃ cittānāṃ saṃpravartitā /
S04bsu021_u:5185: Lank_10.828 gandharvapuramāyādyā rūpā vai kṣaṇikā katham /
S04bsu021_u:5186: abhūtikā ca bhūtāni bhūtāḥ kiṃcitkva cāgatau //
S04bsu021_u:5191: Lank_10.831 pradhānaṃ saha bhāvena guṇabhedaḥ prakīrtitaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:5193: Lank_10.832 yathā hi pāradaḥ śuddha upakleśairna lipyate /
S04bsu021_u:5197: Lank_10.834 anyatve ca tadanyatve ubhayaṃ nobhaye tathā /
S04bsu021_u:5198: astitvaṃ nirupādānaṃ na ca nāsti na saṃskṛtam //
S04bsu021_u:5204: ekatvena tadanyatvena na ca budhyanti tārkikāḥ //
S04bsu021_u:5205: Lank_10.838 darpaṇe udake netre yatha bimbaṃ pradṛśyate /
S04bsu021_u:5207: Lank_10.839 bhāvyaṃ vibhāvanādhyātā mārgaḥ satyā ca darśanam /
S04bsu021_u:5209: Lank_10.840 dṛṣṭaṃ naṣṭaṃ yathā vidyuccakraṃ chidragṛhe yathā /
S04bsu021_u:5217: Lank_10.844 saṃsparśapīḍanābhyāṃ vai devānāṃ nārakāṇi ca /
S04bsu021_u:5233: Lank_10.852 anutpanne ca vijñāne ajñānādi na vidyate /
S04bsu021_u:5234: tadabhāve na vijñānaṃ saṃtatyā jāyate katham //
S04bsu021_u:5241: Lank_10.856 pavanaṃ hi vahnerdahanaṃ preraṇe na tu saṃbhave /
S04bsu021_u:5251: Lank_10.861 cittaṃ sattvāśca nirvāṇaṃ prakṛtyā bhāsurā nu vai /
S04bsu021_u:5255: Lank_10.863 dṛṣṭāśca te yathābhūtaṃ dṛṣṭvā kleśā vidāritāḥ /
S04bsu021_u:5258: na ca budhyanti durmedhā avaktavyaśca kathyate //
S04bsu021_u:5259: Lank_10.865 bherī yathā candanajā bālaiḥ kurvanti nānyathā /
S04bsu021_u:5263: Lank_10.867 imaṃ nayaṃ yo 'numinoti yuktitaḥ prasādavān yogaparo hyakalpanaḥ /
S04bsu021_u:5264: anāśrito hyarthaparo bhavedasau hiraṇmayīṃ dharmagatiṃ pradīpayet //
S04bsu021_u:5265: Lank_10.868 bhāvābhāvapratyayamohakalpanā kudṛṣṭijālaṃ samalaṃ hi tasya tu /
S04bsu021_u:5285: Lank_10.878 nivartate yadā cittaṃ nivṛttaṃ paśyato jagat /
